requestAnimationFrame polyfill by Erik Möller. fixes from Paul Irish and Tino Zijdel\n// MIT license\n(function(){for(var  isIe11 : false,\n        isIe : false,\n        isSafari : false,\n        isChrome : false,\n        isIpad : false,\n        isTouchDevice : false,\n        hasHistory : false,\n        isPhoneScreen : false,\n        isIos : false,\n        isAndroid : false,\n        isOsx : false,\n        isFirefox : false,\n        isWinOs : false,\n        isMobileDevice:false,\n        htmlJqueryObj:null, //here we keep the jQuery object for the HTML element\n\n        \n        runIsPhoneScreen: function () {\n            if ( (jQuery(window).width() < 768 || jQuery(window).height() < 768) && false === tdDetect.isIpad ) {\n                tdDetect.isPhoneScreen = true;\n\n            } else {\n                tdDetect.isPhoneScreen = false;\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        set: function (detector_name, value) {\n            tdDetect[detector_name] = value;\n            //alert('tdDetect: ' + detector_name + ': ' + value);\n        }\n    };\n\n\n    tdDetect.htmlJqueryObj = jQuery('html');\n\n\n    // is touch device ?\n    if ( -1 !== navigator.appVersion.indexOf(\"Win\") ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isWinOs', true);\n    }\n\n    // it looks like it has to have ontouchstart in window and NOT be windows OS. Why? we don't know.\n    if ( !!('ontouchstart' in window) && !tdDetect.isWinOs ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isTouchDevice', true);\n    }\n\n\n    // detect ie8\n    if ( tdDetect.htmlJqueryObj.is('.ie8') ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isIe8', true);\n        tdDetect.set('isIe', true);\n    }\n\n    // detect ie9\n    if ( tdDetect.htmlJqueryObj.is('.ie9') ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isIe9', true);\n        tdDetect.set('isIe', true);\n    }\n\n    // detect ie10 - also adds the ie10 class //it also detects windows mobile IE as IE10\n    if( navigator.userAgent.indexOf(\"MSIE 10.0\") > -1 ){\n        tdDetect.set('isIe10', true);\n        tdDetect.set('isIe', true);\n    }\n\n    //ie 11 check - also adds the ie11 class - it may detect ie on windows mobile\n    if ( !!navigator.userAgent.match(/Trident.*rv\\:11\\./) ){\n        tdDetect.set('isIe11', true);\n        //this.isIe = true; //do not flag ie11 as isIe\n    }\n\n\n    //do we have html5 history support?\n    if (window.history && window.history.pushState) {\n        tdDetect.set('hasHistory', true);\n    }\n\n    //check for safary\n    if ( -1 !== navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Safari')  && -1 === navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Chrome') ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isSafari', true);\n    }\n\n    //chrome and chrome-ium check\n    if (/chrom(e|ium)/.test(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase())) {\n        tdDetect.set('isChrome', true);\n    }\n\n    if ( null !== navigator.userAgent.match(/iPad/i)) {\n        tdDetect.set('isIpad', true);\n    }\n\n\n    if (/(iPad|iPhone|iPod)/g.test( navigator.userAgent )) {\n        tdDetect.set('isIos', true);\n    }\n\n\n    //detect if we run on a mobile device - ipad included - used by the modal / scroll to @see scrollIntoView\n    if( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPad|iPod|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isMobileDevice', true);\n    }\n\n    tdDetect.runIsPhoneScreen();\n\n    //test for android\n    var user_agent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();\n    if ( user_agent.indexOf(\"android\") > -1 ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isAndroid', true);\n    }\n\n\n    if ( -1 !== navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Mac OS X') ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isOsx', true);\n    }\n\n    if ( -1 !== navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Firefox') ) {\n        tdDetect.set('isFirefox', true);\n    }\n\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdViewport = {};\n\n(function(){\n\n    \"use strict\";\n\n    tdViewport = {\n\n        \n        INTERVAL_INITIAL_INDEX: -1,\n\n\n\n        \n        _currentIntervalIndex : tdViewport.INTERVAL_INITIAL_INDEX,\n\n\n\n        \n        _intervalList : [],\n\n\n\n        \n        init: function() {\n            if (('undefined' !== typeof window.td_viewport_interval_list) && (Array === window.td_viewport_interval_list.constructor)) {\n\n                for (var i = 0; i < window.td_viewport_interval_list.length; i++) {\n                    var item = new tdViewport.item();\n\n                    var currentVal = window.td_viewport_interval_list[i];\n\n                    // the check is done to be sure that the intervals are well formatted\n                    if (!currentVal.hasOwnProperty('limitBottom') || !currentVal.hasOwnProperty('sidebarWidth')) {\n                        break;\n                    }\n\n                    item.limitBottom = currentVal.limitBottom;\n                    item.sidebarWidth = currentVal.sidebarWidth;\n\n                    tdViewport._items.push(item);\n                }\n\n                tdViewport.detectChanges();\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        getCurrentIntervalIndex : function() {\n            return tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex;\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        setIntervalList : function(value) {\n            tdViewport._intervalList = value;\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        getIntervalList : function() {\n            return tdViewport._intervalList;\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        getCurrentIntervalItem : function() {\n\n            if ((tdViewport.INTERVAL_INITIAL_INDEX === tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex) || (0 === tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex)) {\n                return null;\n            }\n            return tdViewport._items[tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex - 1];\n        },\n\n\n\n        _items : [],\n\n\n\n        item : function() {\n            this.limitBottom = undefined;\n            this.sidebarWidth = undefined;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n        detectChanges: function() {\n            var result = false;\n\n            var realViewPortWidth = 0;\n            var localCurrentIntervalIndex = 0;\n\n            if (true === tdDetect.isSafari) {\n                realViewPortWidth = this._safariWiewPortWidth.getRealWidth();\n            } else {\n                realViewPortWidth = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientWidth, window.innerWidth || 0);\n            }\n\n            for (var i = 0; i < tdViewport._items.length; i++) {\n\n                if (realViewPortWidth <= tdViewport._items[i].limitBottom) {\n\n                    if (localCurrentIntervalIndex !== tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex) {\n                        tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex = localCurrentIntervalIndex;\n                        result = true;\n\n                        tdViewport.log('changing viewport ' + tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex + ' ~ ' + realViewPortWidth);\n                    }\n                    break;\n                }\n                localCurrentIntervalIndex++;\n            }\n\n            if ((false === result) && (localCurrentIntervalIndex !== tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex)) {\n                tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex = localCurrentIntervalIndex;\n                result = true;\n\n                tdViewport.log('changing viewport ' + tdViewport._currentIntervalIndex + ' ~ ' + realViewPortWidth);\n            }\n            return result;\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _safariWiewPortWidth : {\n            divAdded : false,\n            divJqueryObject : '',\n\n            getRealWidth : function() {\n                if (false === this.divAdded) {\n                    // we don't have a div present\n                    this.divJqueryObject = jQuery('<div>')\n                        .css({\n                            \"height\": \"1px\",\n                            \"position\": \"absolute\",\n                            \"top\": \"-1px\",\n                            \"left\": \"0\",\n                            \"right\": \"0\",\n                            \"visibility\": \"hidden\",\n                            \"z-index\": \"-1\"\n                        });\n                    this.divJqueryObject.appendTo('body');\n                    this.divAdded = true;\n                }\n                return this.divJqueryObject.width();\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n        log: function log(msg) {\n            //console.log(msg);\n        }\n    };\n\n    tdViewport.init();\n\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n(function(){\n    'use strict';\n\n    // top menu\n\n    if (tdDetect.isTouchDevice) {\n        //touch\n        jQuery('.td-header-sp-top-menu .top-header-menu').superfish({\n            delay:300,\n            speed:'fast',\n            useClick:true\n        });\n\n    } else {\n\n        //not touch\n        jQuery('.td-header-sp-top-menu .top-header-menu').superfish({\n            delay:600,\n            speed:200,\n            useClick:false\n        });\n    }\n\n\n\n    // header menu\n    jQuery('#td-header-menu .sf-menu').supersubs({\n        minWidth: 10, // minimum width of sub-menus in em units\n        maxWidth: 40, // maximum width of sub-menus in em units\n        extraWidth: 1 // extra width can ensure lines don't sometimes turn over\n    });\n\n\n\n    if (tdDetect.isTouchDevice) {\n        //touch\n        jQuery('#td-header-menu .sf-menu').superfish({\n            delay:300,\n          useClick:false\n        });\n    }\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdUtil = {};\n\n( function() {\n    \"use strict\";\n\n    tdUtil = {\n\n\n        \n        stopBubble: function( event ) {\n            if ( event && event.stopPropagation ) {\n                event.stopPropagation();\n            } else {\n                window.event.cancelBubble=true;\n            }\n        },\n\n        \n        imageMoveClassToFigure: function ( classSelector ) {\n            jQuery('figure .' + classSelector).each( function() {\n                jQuery(this).parents('figure:first').addClass(classSelector);\n                jQuery(this).removeClass(classSelector);\n            });\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        getBackendVar: function ( variableName ) {\n            if ( typeof window[variableName] === 'undefined' ) {\n                return '';\n            }\n            return window[variableName];\n        },\n\n\n        \n        isUndefined : function ( obj ) {\n            return obj === void 0;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        scrollToElement: function( domElement, duration ) {\n            tdIsScrollingAnimation = true;\n            jQuery(\"html, body\").stop();\n\n\n            var dest;\n\n            //calculate destination place\n            if ( domElement.offset().top > jQuery(document).height() - jQuery(window).height() ) {\n                dest = jQuery(document).height() - jQuery(window).height();\n            } else {\n                dest = domElement.offset().top;\n            }\n            //go to destination\n            jQuery(\"html, body\").animate(\n                { scrollTop: dest },\n                {\n                    duration: duration,\n                    easing:'easeInOutQuart',\n                    complete: function(){\n                        tdIsScrollingAnimation = false;\n                    }\n                }\n            );\n        },\n\n\n        \n        scrollIntoView: function ( domElement ) {\n            \n            tdIsScrollingAnimation = true;\n\n            if ( tdDetect.isMobileDevice === true ) {\n                return; //do not run on any mobile device\n            }\n\n            jQuery(\"html, body\").stop();\n\n\n            var destination = domElement.offset().top;\n            destination = destination - 150;\n\n            var distance = Math.abs( jQuery(window).scrollTop() - destination );\n            var computed_time = distance / 5;\n            //console.log(distance + ' -> ' + computed_time +  ' -> ' + (1100+computed_time));\n\n            //go to destination\n            jQuery(\"html, body\").animate(\n                { scrollTop: destination },\n                {\n                    duration: 1100 + computed_time,\n                    easing:'easeInOutQuart',\n                    complete: function(){\n                        tdIsScrollingAnimation = false;\n                    }\n                }\n            );\n        },\n\n        \n        scrollToPosition: function( pxFromTop, duration ) {\n\n            tdIsScrollingAnimation = true;\n            jQuery(\"html, body\").stop();\n\n            //go to destination\n            jQuery(\"html, body\").animate(\n                { scrollTop: pxFromTop },\n                {\n                    duration: duration,\n                    easing:'easeInOutQuart',\n                    complete: function(){\n                        tdIsScrollingAnimation = false;\n                    }\n                }\n            );\n        },\n        tdMoveY: function ( elm, value ) {\n            var translate = 'translate3d(0px,' + value + 'px, 0px)';\n            elm.style['-webkit-transform'] = translate;\n            elm.style['-moz-transform'] = translate;\n            elm.style['-ms-transform'] = translate;\n            elm.style['-o-transform'] = translate;\n            elm.style.transform = translate;\n        },\n\n\n        isValidUrl: function ( str ) {\n            var pattern = new RegExp('^(https?:\\\\/\\\\/)?'+ // protocol\n                '((([a-z\\\\d]([a-z\\\\d-]*[a-z\\\\d])*)\\\\.)+[a-z]{2,}|'+ // domain name\n                '((\\\\d{1,3}\\\\.){3}\\\\d{1,3}))'+ // OR ip (v4) address\n                '(\\\\:\\\\d+)?(\\\\/[-a-z\\\\d%_.~+]*)*'+ // port and path\n                '(\\\\?[;&a-z\\\\d%_.~+=-]*)?'+ // query string\n                '(\\\\#[-a-z\\\\d_]*)?$','i'); // fragment locator\n\n\n            if( !pattern.test(str) ) {\n                return false;\n            } else {\n                return true;\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        round: function ( value, precision, mode ) {\n            var m, f, isHalf, sgn; // helper variables\n            // making sure precision is integer\n            precision |= 0;\n            m = Math.pow(10, precision);\n            value *= m;\n            // sign of the number\n            sgn = (value > 0) | -(value < 0);\n            isHalf = value % 1 === 0.5 * sgn;\n            f = Math.floor(value);\n\n            if (isHalf) {\n                switch (mode) {\n                    case 'PHP_ROUND_HALF_DOWN':\n                        // rounds .5 toward zero\n                        value = f + (sgn < 0);\n                        break;\n                    case 'PHP_ROUND_HALF_EVEN':\n                        // rouds .5 towards the next even integer\n                        value = f + (f % 2 * sgn);\n                        break;\n                    case 'PHP_ROUND_HALF_ODD':\n                        // rounds .5 towards the next odd integer\n                        value = f + !(f % 2);\n                        break;\n                    default:\n                        // rounds .5 away from zero\n                        value = f + (sgn > 0);\n                }\n            }\n\n            return (isHalf ? value : Math.round(value)) / m;\n        }\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    };\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdAffix = {};\n\n(function(){\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdAffix = {\n\n        // flag used to stop scrolling\n        allow_scroll: true,\n\n        //settings, obtained from ext\n        menu_selector: '', //the affix menu (this element will get the td-affix)\n        menu_wrap_selector: '', //the menu wrapper / placeholder\n        tds_snap_menu: '', //the panel setting\n        tds_snap_menu_logo: '', //the panel setting\n\n        is_menu_affix_height_computed: false, // flag used to compute menu_affix_height only once, when the menu is affix\n        is_menu_affix_height_on_mobile_computed: false, // flag used to compute menu_affix_height_on_mobile only once, when the menu is affix\n\n        menu_affix_height: 0, // the menu affix height [the height when it's really affix]\n        menu_affix_height_on_mobile: 0, // the menu affix height on mobile [the height when it's really affix]\n\n\n        main_menu_height: 0, // main menu height\n        top_offset: 0, //how much the menu is moved from the original position when it's affixed\n        menu_offset: 0, //used to hide the menu on scroll\n        is_requestAnimationFrame_running: false, //prevent multiple calls to requestAnimationFrame\n        is_menu_affix: false, //the current state of the menu, true if the menu is affix\n        is_top_menu: false, //true when the menu is at the top of the screen (0px topScroll)\n\n        //menu offset boundaries - so we do not fire the animation event when the boundary is hit\n        menu_offset_max_hit: false,\n        menu_offset_min_hit: true,\n\n\n        scroll_window_scrollTop_last: 0, //last scrollTop position, used to calculate the scroll direction\n\n        \n        init : function ( atts ) {\n\n            //read the settings\n            tdAffix.menu_selector = atts.menu_selector;\n            tdAffix.menu_wrap_selector = atts.menu_wrap_selector;\n            tdAffix.tds_snap_menu = atts.tds_snap_menu;\n            tdAffix.tds_snap_menu_logo = atts.tds_snap_menu_logo;\n            tdAffix.menu_affix_height = atts.menu_affix_height;\n            tdAffix.menu_affix_height_on_mobile = atts.menu_affix_height_on_mobile;\n\n            //the snap menu is disabled from the panel\n            if ( ! tdAffix.tds_snap_menu ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            // a computation before jquery.ready is necessary for firefox, where tdEvents.scroll comes before\n            if ( tdDetect.isFirefox ) {\n                tdAffix.compute_wrapper();\n                tdAffix.compute_top();\n\n            }\n\n            jQuery().ready(function() {\n                //compute on semi dom ready\n                tdAffix.compute_wrapper();\n                tdAffix.compute_top();\n\n            });\n\n            //recompute when all the page + logos are loaded\n            jQuery( window ).load(function() {\n                tdAffix.compute_wrapper();\n                tdAffix.compute_top();\n\n                //recompute after 1 sec for retarded phones\n                setTimeout(function(){\n                    tdAffix.compute_top();\n                }, 1000 );\n            });\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _get_menu_affix_height: function() {\n\n            //if (tdDetect.isPhoneScreen === true) {\n            //    return tdAffix.menu_affix_height_on_mobile;\n            //}\n            //return tdAffix.menu_affix_height;\n\n            if ( true === tdDetect.isPhoneScreen ) {\n                if ( ! tdAffix.is_menu_affix_height_on_mobile_computed && tdAffix.is_menu_affix ) {\n\n                    tdAffix.is_menu_affix_height_on_mobile_computed = true;\n\n                    // overwrite the tdAffix.menu_affix_height_on_mobile variable with the real affix height\n                    tdAffix.menu_affix_height_on_mobile = jQuery(tdAffix.menu_selector).height();\n                }\n                return tdAffix.menu_affix_height_on_mobile;\n            }\n\n            if ( ! tdAffix.is_menu_affix_height_computed && tdAffix.is_menu_affix ) {\n\n                tdAffix.is_menu_affix_height_computed = true;\n\n                // overwrite the tdAffix.menu_affix_height variable with the real affix height\n                tdAffix.menu_affix_height = jQuery(tdAffix.menu_selector).height();\n            }\n            return tdAffix.menu_affix_height;\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        td_events_scroll: function( scrollTop ) {\n\n            if ( ! tdAffix.allow_scroll ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            //do not run if we don't have a snap menu\n            if ( ! tdAffix.tds_snap_menu ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            \n            var scroll_direction = '';\n\n            if ( 'snap' !== tdAffix.tds_snap_menu ) { //do not run on snap\n                if ( ( 'smart_snap_mobile' !== tdAffix.tds_snap_menu || true === tdDetect.isPhoneScreen ) ) {  // different from smart_snap_mobile or tdDetect.isPhoneScreen === true\n\n                    var scrollDelta = 0;\n\n                    //check the direction\n                    if ( scrollTop !== tdAffix.scroll_window_scrollTop_last ) { //compute direction only if we have different last scroll top\n                        // compute the direction of the scroll\n                        if ( scrollTop > tdAffix.scroll_window_scrollTop_last ) {\n                            scroll_direction = 'down';\n                        } else {\n                            scroll_direction = 'up';\n                        }\n                        //calculate the scroll delta\n                        scrollDelta = Math.abs( scrollTop - tdAffix.scroll_window_scrollTop_last );\n                    }\n\n                    tdAffix.scroll_window_scrollTop_last = scrollTop;\n                }\n            }\n\n            \n\n            // show the logo on sticky menu\n            if ( '' !== tdAffix.tds_snap_menu && '' !== tdAffix.tds_snap_menu_logo ) {\n                jQuery( '.td-main-menu-logo' ).addClass( 'td-logo-sticky' );\n            }\n\n\n\n\n            //if the menu is in the affix state\n\n            // the next check is to keep the text from the menu at the same position, when the menu comes from affix off to affix off\n            if ( ( scrollTop > tdAffix.top_offset + ( tdAffix.main_menu_height / 2 - tdAffix._get_menu_affix_height() / 2 ) ) ||\n\n                    // - the affix is OFF when the next condition is not accomplished, which means that the affix is ON\n                    // and the scroll to the top is LOWER than the initial tdAffix.top_offset reduced by the affix real height\n                    // - this condition makes the transition from the small affix menu to the larger menu of the page\n                ( ( tdAffix.is_menu_affix === true ) && ( 'smart_snap_always' === tdAffix.tds_snap_menu) && scrollTop > ( tdAffix.top_offset - tdAffix._get_menu_affix_height() ) ) ||\n\n                tdAffix.is_top_menu === true ) {\n\n                //get the menu element\n                var td_affix_menu_element = jQuery( tdAffix.menu_selector );\n\n                //turn affix on for it\n                tdAffix._affix_on( td_affix_menu_element );\n\n\n                //if the menu is only with snap or we are on smart_snap_mobile + mobile, our job here in this function is done, return\n                if ( 'snap' === tdAffix.tds_snap_menu || ( 'smart_snap_mobile' === tdAffix.tds_snap_menu && false === tdDetect.isPhoneScreen ) ) {\n                    return;\n                }\n\n                \n\n\n                \n\n\n                // boundary check - to not run the position on each scroll event\n                if ( ( false === tdAffix.menu_offset_max_hit && 'down' === scroll_direction ) || ( false === tdAffix.menu_offset_min_hit && 'up' === scroll_direction ) ) {\n                    //request animation frame\n                    //if (tdAffix.is_requestAnimationFrame_running === false) {\n                    window.requestAnimationFrame(function(){\n\n                        //console.log(tdAffix.menu_offset);\n                        //console.log(scrollDelta);\n                        var offset = 0;\n\n\n                        if ( scrollTop > 0 ) { // ios returns negative scrollTop values\n                            if ( 'down' === scroll_direction ) {\n\n                                //compute the offset\n                                offset = tdAffix.menu_offset - scrollDelta;\n\n                                // the offset is a value in the [-tdAffix.menu_affix_height, 0] and\n                                // not into the interval [-tdAffix.main_menu_height, 0]\n                                if ( offset < -tdAffix._get_menu_affix_height() ) {\n                                    offset = -tdAffix._get_menu_affix_height();\n                                }\n\n                            } else if ( 'up' === scroll_direction ) {\n                                //compute the offset\n                                offset = tdAffix.menu_offset + scrollDelta;\n                                if ( offset > 0 ) {\n                                    offset = 0;\n                                }\n                            }\n                        }\n\n                        //td_debug.log_live(scroll_direction + ' | scrollTop: ' + scrollTop + '  | offset: ' + offset);\n\n                        //tdAffix.is_requestAnimationFrame_running = true;\n\n                        //console.log(offset);\n\n                        //move the menu\n                        tdUtil.tdMoveY( td_affix_menu_element[0], offset );\n\n                        //td_affix_menu_element.css({top: (offset) + 'px'});  //legacy menu move code\n\n                        //check boundaries\n                        if ( 0 === offset ) {\n                            tdAffix.menu_offset_min_hit = true;\n                        } else {\n                            tdAffix.menu_offset_min_hit = false;\n                        }\n\n\n                        if ( offset === -tdAffix._get_menu_affix_height() ) {\n                            tdAffix.menu_offset_max_hit = true;\n                            //also hide the menu when it's 100% out of view on ios - the safari header is transparent and we can see the menu\n                            if ( ( true === tdDetect.isIos ) || tdDetect.isSafari ) { // safari also\n                                td_affix_menu_element.hide();\n                            }\n\n                            //show the logo on smart sticky menu\n                            if ( '' !== tdAffix.tds_snap_menu_logo ) {\n                                jQuery( '.td-main-menu-logo' ).addClass( 'td-logo-sticky' );\n                            }\n                        } else {\n                            tdAffix.menu_offset_max_hit = false;\n\n                            if ( ( true === tdDetect.isIos ) || tdDetect.isSafari ) { //ios safari fix\n                                td_affix_menu_element.show();\n                            }\n                        }\n\n                        //tdAffix.is_requestAnimationFrame_running = false;\n\n                        tdAffix.menu_offset = offset; //update the current offset of the menu\n\n                    }, td_affix_menu_element[0] );\n\n                    //}\n                    //console.log(offset + ' ' + scroll_direction);\n\n                } //end boundary check\n\n            } else {\n                tdAffix._affix_off( jQuery( tdAffix.menu_selector ) );\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        \n        compute_top: function() {\n\n            // to compute from the bottom of the menu, the top offset is incremented by the menu wrap height\n            tdAffix.top_offset = jQuery( tdAffix.menu_wrap_selector ).offset().top;// + jQuery(tdAffix.menu_wrap_selector).height();\n\n\n            // The top_offset is incremented with the menu_affix_height only on 'smart_snap_always', because of the sidebar\n            // which use the menu_offset (and menu_offset depends on this top_offset)\n            //\n            // Consider that the smart sidebar, increment the td_affix_menu_computed_height with the menu_offset value\n            // when the menu is on 'smart_snap_always'\n            if ( 'smart_snap_always' === tdAffix.tds_snap_menu ) {\n                tdAffix.top_offset += tdAffix.menu_affix_height;\n            }\n\n\n            //check to see if the menu is at the top of the screen\n            if ( 1 === tdAffix.top_offset ) {\n                //switch to affix - because the menu is at the top of the page\n                //tdAffix._affix_on(jQuery(tdAffix.menu_selector));\n                tdAffix.is_top_menu = true;\n            } else {\n                //check to see the current top offset\n                tdAffix.is_top_menu = false;\n            }\n            tdAffix.td_events_scroll( jQuery(window).scrollTop() );\n\n            //alert(tdAffix.top_offset);\n            //console.log('computed: ' + tdAffix.top_offset);\n        },\n\n\n        \n        compute_wrapper: function() {\n\n            // td-affix class is removed to compute a real height when the compute_wrapper is done on a scrolled page\n            if ( jQuery( tdAffix.menu_selector ).hasClass( 'td-affix' ) ) {\n                jQuery( tdAffix.menu_selector ).removeClass( 'td-affix' );\n\n                //read the height of the menu\n                tdAffix.main_menu_height = jQuery( tdAffix.menu_selector ).height();\n\n                jQuery( tdAffix.menu_selector ).addClass( 'td-affix' );\n\n            } else {\n                //read the height of the menu\n                tdAffix.main_menu_height = jQuery( tdAffix.menu_selector ).height();\n            }\n\n            // put the menu height to the wrapper. The wrapper remains in the place when the menu is affixed\n            jQuery( tdAffix.menu_wrap_selector ).css( 'height', tdAffix.main_menu_height );\n        },\n\n        \n        _affix_on: function( td_affix_menu_element ) {\n            if ( false === tdAffix.is_menu_affix ) {\n\n\n                // Bug.Fix - affix menu flickering\n                // - the td_affix_menu_element is hidden because he is outside of the viewport\n                // - without it, there's a flicker effect of applying css style (classes) over it\n\n                if ( ( 'smart_snap_always' === tdAffix.tds_snap_menu ) && ( tdDetect.isPhoneScreen !== true ) ) {\n                    td_affix_menu_element.css( 'visibility', 'hidden' );\n                }\n\n                tdAffix.menu_offset = -tdAffix.top_offset;\n\n                //make the menu fixed\n                td_affix_menu_element.addClass( 'td-affix' );\n\n                //add body-td-affix class on body for header style 8 -> when scrolling down the window jumps 76px up when the menu is changing from header style 8 default to header style 8 affix\n                jQuery( 'body' ).addClass( 'body-td-affix' );\n\n                tdAffix.is_menu_affix = true;\n            } else {\n\n                // the td_affix_menu element is kept visible\n                if ( true  !== tdDetect.isPhoneScreen ) {\n                    td_affix_menu_element.css( 'visibility', '' );\n                }\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        _affix_off: function( td_affix_menu_element ) {\n            if ( true === tdAffix.is_menu_affix ) {\n                //make the menu normal\n                jQuery( tdAffix.menu_selector ).removeClass( 'td-affix' );\n\n                //console.log(tdAffix.tds_snap_menu_logo);\n                //hide the logo from sticky menu when the menu is not affix\n                if( '' === tdAffix.tds_snap_menu_logo ) {\n                    jQuery( '.td-main-menu-logo' ).removeClass( 'td-logo-sticky' );\n                }\n\n                //remove body-td-affix class on body for header style 8 -> when scrolling down the window jumps 76px up when the menu is changing from header style 8 default to header style 8 affix\n                jQuery( 'body' ).removeClass( 'body-td-affix' );\n\n                tdAffix.is_menu_affix = false;\n\n                //move the menu to 0 (ios seems to skip animation frames)\n                tdUtil.tdMoveY( td_affix_menu_element[0], 0 );\n\n                if ( ( true === tdDetect.isIos ) || tdDetect.isSafari ) {\n                    td_affix_menu_element.show();\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    };\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\"use strict\";\n\n\n\n\n\n\njQuery().ready(function jQuery_ready() {\n\n    //retina images\n    td_retina();\n\n\n\n    // the mobile pull left menu (off canvas)\n    //td_mobile_menu();\n\n    //handles the toogle efect on mobile menu\n    td_mobile_menu_toogle();\n\n\n    //resize all the videos if we have them\n    td_resize_videos();\n\n    //fake placeholder for ie\n    jQuery('input, textarea').placeholder();\n\n    //more stories box\n    td_more_articles_box.init();\n\n    //used for smart lists\n    td_smart_lists_magnific_popup();\n\n    //smart list drop down pagination\n    td_smart_list_dropdown();\n\n    // the top menu date\n    if (typeof tdsDateFormat !== 'undefined') {\n\n        // php time() equivalent - js deals in milliseconds and php in seconds\n        var tdsDateTimestamp = Math.floor(new Date().getTime() / 1000);\n\n        // replace the date\n        var tdNewDateI18n = td_date_i18n(tdsDateFormat, tdsDateTimestamp);\n        jQuery('.td_data_time').text(tdNewDateI18n);\n    }\n\n    setMenuMinHeight();\n\n}); //end on load\n\n\n\nfunction td_smart_list_dropdown() {\n    jQuery('.td-smart-list-dropdown').on('change', function() {\n        window.location = this.value;\n    });\n}\n\n\n\nvar td_more_articles_box = {\n    is_box_visible:false,\n    cookie:'',\n    distance_from_top:400,\n\n    init: function init() {\n\n\n        //read the cookie\n        td_more_articles_box.cookie = td_read_site_cookie('td-cookie-more-articles');\n\n\n        //setting distance from the top\n        if(!isNaN(parseInt(tds_more_articles_on_post_pages_distance_from_top)) && isFinite(tds_more_articles_on_post_pages_distance_from_top) && parseInt(tds_more_articles_on_post_pages_distance_from_top) > 0){\n            td_more_articles_box.distance_from_top = parseInt(tds_more_articles_on_post_pages_distance_from_top);\n        } else {\n            td_more_articles_box.distance_from_top = 400;\n        }\n\n        //adding event to hide the box\n        jQuery('.td-close-more-articles-box').click(function(){\n\n            //hiding the box\n            jQuery('.td-more-articles-box').removeClass('td-front-end-display-block');\n            jQuery('.td-more-articles-box').hide();\n\n            //cookie life\n            if(!isNaN(parseInt(tds_more_articles_on_post_time_to_wait)) && isFinite(tds_more_articles_on_post_time_to_wait)){\n                //setting cookie\n                td_set_cookies_life(['td-cookie-more-articles', 'hide-more-articles-box', parseInt(tds_more_articles_on_post_time_to_wait)*86400000]);//86400000 is the number of milliseconds in a day\n            }\n        });\n    },\n\n    \n    td_events_scroll: function td_events_scroll(scrollTop) {\n\n        if(tdIsScrollingAnimation) { //do not fire the event on animations\n            return;\n        }\n\n        //check to see if it's enable form panel and also from cookie\n        if(tdUtil.getBackendVar('tds_more_articles_on_post_enable') == \"show\" && td_more_articles_box.cookie != 'hide-more-articles-box') {\n\n            if (scrollTop > td_more_articles_box.distance_from_top ) {\n                if (td_more_articles_box.is_box_visible === false) {\n                    jQuery('.td-more-articles-box').addClass('td-front-end-display-block');\n                    td_more_articles_box.is_box_visible = true;\n                }\n            } else {\n                if (td_more_articles_box.is_box_visible === true) {\n                    jQuery('.td-more-articles-box').removeClass('td-front-end-display-block');\n                    td_more_articles_box.is_box_visible = false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    }\n};\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar td_resize_timer_id;\njQuery(window).resize(function() {\n    clearTimeout(td_resize_timer_id);\n    td_resize_timer_id = setTimeout(function() {\n        td_done_resizing();\n    }, 200);\n\n});\n\nfunction td_done_resizing(){\n    td_resize_videos();\n}\n\n\n\n\nfunction td_resize_videos() {\n    //youtube in content\n    jQuery(document).find('iframe[src*=\"youtube.com\"]').each(function() {\n        var videoMainContainer = jQuery(this).parent().parent().parent(),\n            videoInPlaylist = jQuery(this).parent().hasClass(\"td_wrapper_playlist_player_vimeo\"),\n            video43AspectRatio = videoMainContainer.hasClass(\"vc_video-aspect-ratio-43\"), //the video is set to 4:3 aspect ratio\n            video235AspectRatio = videoMainContainer.hasClass(\"vc_video-aspect-ratio-235\"); //the video is set to 2.35:1 aspect ratio\n        if(videoInPlaylist || video43AspectRatio || video235AspectRatio) {\n            //do nothing for playlist player youtube or aspect ratios 4:3 and 2.35:1\n            //the video aspect ratio can be set on Visual Composer - Video Player widget settings\n        } else {\n            var td_video = jQuery(this);\n            td_video.attr('width', '100%');\n            var td_video_width = td_video.width();\n            td_video.css('height', td_video_width * 0.5625, 'important');\n        }\n    });\n\n\n    //vimeo in content\n    jQuery(document).find('iframe[src*=\"vimeo.com\"]').each(function() {\n        var videoMainContainer = jQuery(this).parent().parent().parent(),\n            videoInPlaylist = jQuery(this).parent().hasClass(\"td_wrapper_playlist_player_vimeo\"),\n            video43AspectRatio = videoMainContainer.hasClass(\"vc_video-aspect-ratio-43\"), //the video is set to 4:3 aspect ratio\n            video235AspectRatio = videoMainContainer.hasClass(\"vc_video-aspect-ratio-235\"); //the video is set to 2.35:1 aspect ratio\n        if(videoInPlaylist || video43AspectRatio || video235AspectRatio) {\n            //do nothing for playlist player vimeo or aspect ratios 4:3 and 2.35:1\n            //the video aspect ratio can be set on Visual Composer - Video Player widget settings\n        } else {\n            var td_video = jQuery(this);\n            td_video.attr('width', '100%');\n            var td_video_width = td_video.width();\n            td_video.css('height', td_video_width * 0.5625, 'important');\n        }\n    });\n\n\n    //daily motion in content\n    jQuery(document).find('iframe[src*=\"dailymotion.com\"]').each(function() {\n        var videoMainContainer = jQuery(this).parent().parent().parent(),\n            video43AspectRatio = videoMainContainer.hasClass(\"vc_video-aspect-ratio-43\"), //video aspect ratio 4:3\n            video235AspectRatio = videoMainContainer.hasClass(\"vc_video-aspect-ratio-235\"); //video aspect ratio 2.35:1\n        if (video43AspectRatio || video235AspectRatio) {\n            //do nothing for video aspect ratios 4:3 and 2.35:1\n            //the video aspect ratio can be set on Visual Composer - Video Player widget settings\n        } else {\n            var td_video = jQuery(this);\n            td_video.attr('width', '100%');\n            var td_video_width = td_video.width();\n            td_video.css('height', td_video_width * 0.6, 'important');\n        }\n\n    });\n\n\n    //wordpress embedded\n    jQuery(document).find(\".wp-video-shortcode\").each(function() {\n        var td_video = jQuery(this);\n\n        var td_video_width = td_video.width() + 3;\n        jQuery(this).parent().css('height', td_video_width * 0.56, 'important');\n        //td_video.css('height', td_video_width * 0.6, 'important')\n        td_video.css('width', '100%', 'important');\n        td_video.css('height', '100%', 'important');\n    })\n}\n\n\n\n\n\n\n//handles mobile menu\nfunction td_mobile_menu() {\n    //jQuery('#td-top-mobile-toggle a, .td-mobile-close a').click(function(){\n    //    if(jQuery('body').hasClass('td-menu-mob-open-menu')) {\n    //        jQuery('body').removeClass('td-menu-mob-open-menu');\n    //    } else {\n    //        if (tdDetect.isMobileDevice) {\n    //            // on mobile devices scroll to top instantly and wait a bit and open the menu\n    //            window.scrollTo(0, 0);\n    //            setTimeout(function(){\n    //                jQuery('body').addClass('td-menu-mob-open-menu');\n    //            }, 100);\n    //        } else {\n    //            // on desktop open it with full animations\n    //            jQuery('body').addClass('td-menu-mob-open-menu');\n    //            setTimeout(function(){\n    //                tdUtil.scrollToPosition(0, 1200);\n    //            }, 200);\n    //        }\n    //    }\n    //});\n}\n\n\n//handles open/close mobile menu\nfunction td_mobile_menu_toogle() {\n\n    //jQuery('#td-mobile-nav .menu-item-has-children ul').hide();\n    //\n    ////move thru all the menu and find the item with sub-menues to atach a custom class to them\n    //jQuery(document).find('#td-mobile-nav .menu-item-has-children').each(function(i) {\n    //\n    //    var class_name = 'td_mobile_elem_with_submenu_' + i;\n    //    jQuery(this).addClass(class_name);\n    //\n    //    //add an element to click on\n    //    //jQuery(this).children(\"a\").append('<div class=\"td-element-after\" data-parent-class=\"' + class_name + '\"></div>');\n    //    jQuery(this).children(\"a\").append('<i class=\"td-icon-menu-down td-element-after\" data-parent-class=\"' + class_name + '\"></i>');\n    //\n    //\n    //    //click on link elements with #\n    //    jQuery(this).children(\"a\").addClass(\"td-link-element-after\").attr(\"data-parent-class\", class_name);\n    //});\n    //\n    //jQuery(\".td-element-after, .td-link-element-after\").click(function(event) {\n    //\n    //    if(jQuery(this).hasClass(\"td-element-after\") || jQuery(this).attr(\"href\") == \"#\" ){\n    //        event.preventDefault();\n    //        event.stopPropagation();\n    //    }\n    //\n    //\n    //    //take the li parent class\n    //    var parent_class = jQuery(this).data('parent-class');\n    //\n    //    //target the sub-menu to open\n    //    var target_to_open = '#td-mobile-nav .' + parent_class + ' > a + ul';\n    //    if(jQuery(target_to_open).css('display') == 'none') {\n    //        jQuery(target_to_open).show();\n    //    } else {\n    //        jQuery(target_to_open).hide();\n    //    }\n    //\n    //\n    //});\n\n    jQuery( '#td-top-mobile-toggle a, .td-mobile-close a' ).click(function(){\n        if ( jQuery( 'body' ).hasClass( 'td-menu-mob-open-menu' ) ) {\n            jQuery( 'body' ).removeClass( 'td-menu-mob-open-menu' );\n        } else {\n            jQuery( 'body' ).addClass( 'td-menu-mob-open-menu' );\n        }\n    });\n\n\n    //handles open/close mobile menu\n\n    //move thru all the menu and find the item with sub-menues to atach a custom class to them\n    jQuery( document ).find( '#td-mobile-nav .menu-item-has-children' ).each(function( i ) {\n\n        var class_name = 'td_mobile_elem_with_submenu_' + i;\n        jQuery(this).addClass( class_name );\n\n        //click on link elements with #\n        jQuery(this).children('a').addClass( 'td-link-element-after' );\n\n        jQuery(this).click(function( event ) {\n\n            \n\n            var jQueryTarget = jQuery( event.target );\n\n            // html i element\n            if ( jQueryTarget.length &&\n                ( ( jQueryTarget.hasClass( 'td-element-after') || jQueryTarget.hasClass( 'td-link-element-after') ) &&\n                ( '#' === jQueryTarget.attr( 'href' ) || undefined === jQueryTarget.attr( 'href' ) ) ) ) {\n\n                event.preventDefault();\n                event.stopPropagation();\n\n                jQuery( this ).toggleClass( 'td-sub-menu-open' );\n            }\n        });\n    });\n}\n\n\n\n\n\nfunction td_retina() {\n    if (window.devicePixelRatio > 1) {\n        jQuery('.td-retina').each(function(i) {\n            var lowres = jQuery(this).attr('src');\n            var highres = lowres.replace(\".png\", \"@2x.png\");\n            highres = highres.replace(\".jpg\", \"@2x.jpg\");\n            jQuery(this).attr('src', highres);\n\n        });\n\n\n        //custom logo support\n        jQuery('.td-retina-data').each(function(i) {\n            jQuery(this).attr('src', jQuery(this).data('retina'));\n            //fix logo aligment on retina devices\n            jQuery(this).addClass('td-retina-version');\n        });\n\n    }\n}\n\n\n\n//click only on BACKGROUND, for devices that don't have touch (ex: phone, tablets)\nif(!tdDetect.isTouchDevice && tdUtil.getBackendVar('td_ad_background_click_link') != '') {\n\n    //var ev = ev || window.event;\n    //var target = ev.target || ev.srcElement;\n    jQuery('body').click(function(event) {\n\n        //getting the target element that the user clicks - for W3C and MSIE\n        var target = (event.target) ? event.target : event.srcElement;\n\n        //only click on background\n\n        var target_jquery_obj = jQuery(target);\n\n        // td-content-wrap for NEWSMAG and td-boxex-layout for NEWSPAPER\n        if (target_jquery_obj.hasClass('td-content-wrap') || target_jquery_obj.hasClass('td-boxed-layout')) {\n\n            //open the link ad page\n            if(td_ad_background_click_target == '_blank') {\n                //open in a new window\n                window.open(td_ad_background_click_link)\n            } else {\n                //open in the same window\n                location.href = td_ad_background_click_link;\n            }\n        }\n\n        //e.stopPropagation();\n        //stopBubble(event);\n    });\n}\n\n\n\n\n\n\nfunction td_read_site_cookie(name) {\n    var nameEQ = escape(name) + \"=\";\n    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');\n    for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {\n        var c = ca[i];\n        while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') c = c.substring(1, c.length);\n        if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return unescape(c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length));\n    }\n    return null;\n}\n\n\n\nfunction td_set_cookies_life(td_time_cookie_array) {\n    var expiry = new Date();\n    expiry.setTime(expiry.getTime() + td_time_cookie_array[2]);\n\n    // Date()'s toGMTSting() method will format the date correctly for a cookie\n    document.cookie = td_time_cookie_array[0] + \"=\" + td_time_cookie_array[1] + \"; expires=\" + expiry.toGMTString() + \"; path=/\";\n}\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdIsScrollingAnimation = false;\nvar td_mouse_wheel_or_touch_moved = false; //we want to know if the user stopped the animation via touch or mouse move\n\n//stop the animation on mouse wheel\njQuery(document).bind('mousewheel DOMMouseScroll MozMousePixelScroll', function(e){\n\n\n    if (tdIsScrollingAnimation === false) {\n        return;\n    } else {\n\n        tdIsScrollingAnimation = false;\n        td_mouse_wheel_or_touch_moved = true;\n\n        jQuery(\"html, body\").stop();\n    }\n});\n\n//stop the animation on touch\nif (document.addEventListener){\n    document.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e) {\n        if (tdIsScrollingAnimation === false) {\n            return;\n        } else {\n            tdIsScrollingAnimation = false;\n            td_mouse_wheel_or_touch_moved = true;\n            jQuery(\"html, body\").stop();\n        }\n    }, false);\n}\n\n\nvar td_scroll_to_top_is_visible = false;\nfunction td_events_scroll_scroll_to_top(scrollTop) {\n    if(tdIsScrollingAnimation) {  //do not fire the event on animations\n        return;\n    }\n    if (scrollTop > 400) {\n        if (td_scroll_to_top_is_visible === false) { //only add class if needed\n            td_scroll_to_top_is_visible = true;\n            jQuery('.td-scroll-up').addClass('td-scroll-up-visible');\n        }\n    } else {\n        if (td_scroll_to_top_is_visible === true) { //only add class if needed\n            td_scroll_to_top_is_visible = false;\n            jQuery('.td-scroll-up').removeClass('td-scroll-up-visible');\n        }\n    }\n}\n\n\njQuery('.td-scroll-up').click(function(){\n    if(tdIsScrollingAnimation) { //double check - because when we remove the class, the button is still visible for a while\n        return;\n    }\n\n    //hide the button\n    td_scroll_to_top_is_visible = false;\n    jQuery('.td-scroll-up').removeClass('td-scroll-up-visible');\n\n    //hide more articles box\n    td_more_articles_box.is_box_visible = false;\n    jQuery('.td-more-articles-box').removeClass('td-front-end-display-block');\n\n    //scroll to top\n    tdUtil.scrollToPosition(0, 1200);\n\n    return false;\n});\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n// small down arrow on template 6 and full width index\njQuery('.td-read-down a').click(function(event){\n    event.preventDefault();\n    tdUtil.scrollToPosition(jQuery('.td-full-screen-header-image-wrap').height(), 1200);\n    //tdUtil.scrollToPosition(jQuery('.td-full-screen-header-image-wrap').height() + jQuery('.td-full-screen-header-image-wrap').offset().top, 1200);\n});\n\n\nfunction td_post_template_6_title() {\n\n\n\n    //define all the variables - for better performance ?\n    var td_parallax_el = document.getElementById('td_parallax_header_6');\n\n    var td_parallax_bg_el = document.getElementById('td-full-screen-header-image');\n\n    var scroll_from_top = '';\n    var distance_from_bottom;\n\n    //attach the animation tick on scroll\n    jQuery(window).scroll(function(){\n        // with each scroll event request an animation frame (we have a polyfill for animation frame)\n        // the requestAnimationFrame is called only once and after that we wait\n        td_request_tick();\n    });\n\n\n    var td_animation_running = false; //if the tick is running, we set this to true\n\n    function td_request_tick() {\n        if (td_animation_running === false) {\n            window.requestAnimationFrame(td_do_animation);\n        }\n        td_animation_running = true;\n    }\n\n    \n    function td_do_animation() {\n        scroll_from_top = jQuery(document).scrollTop();\n        if (scroll_from_top <= 950) { //stop the animation after scroll from top\n\n            var blur_value = 1 - (scroll_from_top / 800); // @todo trebuie verificata formula??\n            if (tdDetect.isIe8 === true) {\n                blur_value = 1;\n            }\n\n\n            blur_value = Math.round(blur_value * 100) / 100;\n\n            //opacity\n            td_parallax_el.style.opacity = blur_value;\n\n            //move the bg\n            var parallax_move = -Math.round(scroll_from_top / 4);\n            tdUtil.tdMoveY(td_parallax_bg_el,-parallax_move);\n\n\n            //move the title + cat\n            distance_from_bottom = -Math.round(scroll_from_top / 8);\n            tdUtil.tdMoveY(td_parallax_el,-distance_from_bottom);\n            //td_parallax_el.style.bottom = distance_from_bottom + \"px\";  //un accelerated version\n\n\n        }\n\n        td_animation_running = false;\n    }\n\n\n\n}\n\n//used for smart lists\nfunction td_smart_lists_magnific_popup() {\n    //magnific popup\n    jQuery(\".td-lightbox-enabled\").magnificPopup({\n        delegate: \"a\",\n        type: \"image\",\n        tLoading: \"Loading image #%curr%...\",\n        mainClass: \"mfp-img-mobile\",\n        gallery: {\n            enabled: true,\n            navigateByImgClick: true,\n            preload: [0,1],\n            tCounter: tdUtil.getBackendVar('td_magnific_popup_translation_tCounter') // Markup for \"1 of 7\" counter\n        },\n        image: {\n            tError: \"<a href=\\'%url%\\'>The image #%curr%</a> could not be loaded.\",\n            titleSrc: function(item) {//console.log(item.el);\n                //alert(jQuery(item.el).data(\"caption\"));\n                return item.el.attr(\"data-caption\");\n            }\n        },\n        zoom: {\n            enabled: true,\n            duration: 300,\n            opener: function(element) {\n                return element.find(\"img\");\n            }\n        },\n        callbacks: {\n            change: function(item) {\n                \n                //console.log(item);\n                //console.log(item.el[0].id);\n                //console.log(parseInt(nr_slide[1]) + 1);\n                if(item.el[0].id != '') {\n                    var nr_slide = item.el[0].id.split(\"_\");\n\n                    // Will fire when popup is closed\n                    //jQuery(\".td-iosSlider\").iosSlider(\"goToSlide\", this.currItem.index + 1 );\n                    jQuery(\".td-iosSlider\").iosSlider(\"goToSlide\", parseInt(nr_slide[1]) + 1);\n                } else {\n                    tdModalImageLastEl = item.el;\n                    setTimeout(function(){\n                        tdUtil.scrollIntoView(item.el);\n                    }, 100);\n                }\n            },\n            beforeClose: function() {\n                if (tdModalImageLastEl != '') {\n\n                    tdUtil.scrollIntoView(tdModalImageLastEl);\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    });\n}\n\n\n\n\n\nfunction td_get_document_width() {\n    var x = 0;\n    if (self.innerHeight)\n    {\n        x = self.innerWidth;\n    }\n    else if (document.documentElement && document.documentElement.clientHeight)\n    {\n        x = document.documentElement.clientWidth;\n    }\n    else if (document.body)\n    {\n        x = document.body.clientWidth;\n    }\n    return x;\n}\n\nfunction td_get_document_height() {\n    var y = 0;\n    if (self.innerHeight)\n    {\n        y = self.innerHeight;\n    }\n    else if (document.documentElement && document.documentElement.clientHeight)\n    {\n        y = document.documentElement.clientHeight;\n    }\n    else if (document.body)\n    {\n        y = document.body.clientHeight;\n    }\n    return y;\n}\n\n\n\nfunction setMenuMinHeight() {\n    var tdMobileMenu = jQuery( '#td-mobile-nav' );\n\n    if ( tdMobileMenu.length ) {\n        tdMobileMenu.css( 'min-height' , (tdEvents.window_innerHeight+1) + 'px' );\n    }\n}\n\n\n\nvar tdLoadingBox = {};\n\n\n( function() {\n    \"use strict\";\n    tdLoadingBox = {\n\n        //arrayColors: ['#ffffff', '#fafafa', '#ececec', '#dddddd', '#bfbfbf', '#9a9a9a', '#7e7e7e', '#636363'],//whiter -> darker\n\n        speed: 40,\n\n        arrayColorsTemp: [\n            'rgba(99, 99, 99, 0)',\n            'rgba(99, 99, 99, 0.05)',\n            'rgba(99, 99, 99, 0.08)',\n            'rgba(99, 99, 99, 0.2)',\n            'rgba(99, 99, 99, 0.3)',\n            'rgba(99, 99, 99, 0.5)',\n            'rgba(99, 99, 99, 0.6)',\n            'rgba(99, 99, 99, 1)'\n        ],//whiter -> darker\n\n        arrayColors: [],\n\n        statusAnimation: 'stop',\n\n        //stop loading box\n        stop : function stop () {\n            tdLoadingBox.statusAnimation = 'stop';\n            //jQuery('.td-loader-gif').html(\"\");\n        },\n\n\n        //init loading box\n        init : function init (color, speed) {\n\n            // set up the speed\n            if (false === tdUtil.isUndefined(speed)) {\n                tdLoadingBox.speed = speed;\n            }\n\n            //console.log('test');\n            var tdColorRegExp = /^#[a-zA-Z0-9]{3,6}$/;\n            if(color && tdColorRegExp.test(color)) {\n\n                var colRgba = tdLoadingBox.hexToRgb(color);\n\n                var rgbaString = \"rgba(\" + colRgba.r + \", \" + colRgba.g + \", \" + colRgba.b + \", \";\n\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[7] = rgbaString + \" 1)\";\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[6] = rgbaString + \" 0.6)\";\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[5] = rgbaString + \" 0.5)\";\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[4] = rgbaString + \" 0.3)\";\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[3] = rgbaString + \" 0.2)\";\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[2] = rgbaString + \" 0.08)\";\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[1] = rgbaString + \" 0.05)\";\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[0] = rgbaString + \" 0)\";\n\n            } else {\n                //default array\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors = tdLoadingBox.arrayColorsTemp.slice(0);\n\n            }\n\n            if(tdLoadingBox.statusAnimation === 'stop') {\n                tdLoadingBox.statusAnimation = 'display';\n                this.render();\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        //create the animation\n        render: function render (color) {\n\n            //call the animationDisplay function\n            tdLoadingBox.animationDisplay(\n                '<div class=\"td-lb-box td-lb-box-1\" style=\"background-color:' + tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[0] + '\"></div>' +\n                '<div class=\"td-lb-box td-lb-box-2\" style=\"background-color:' + tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[1] + '\"></div>' +\n                '<div class=\"td-lb-box td-lb-box-3\" style=\"background-color:' + tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[2] + '\"></div>' +\n                '<div class=\"td-lb-box td-lb-box-4\" style=\"background-color:' + tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[3] + '\"></div>' +\n                '<div class=\"td-lb-box td-lb-box-5\" style=\"background-color:' + tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[4] + '\"></div>' +\n                '<div class=\"td-lb-box td-lb-box-6\" style=\"background-color:' + tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[5] + '\"></div>' +\n                '<div class=\"td-lb-box td-lb-box-7\" style=\"background-color:' + tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[6] + '\"></div>' +\n                '<div class=\"td-lb-box td-lb-box-8\" style=\"background-color:' + tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[7] + '\"></div>'\n            );\n\n            //direction right\n            var tempColorArray = [\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[0],\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[1],\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[2],\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[3],\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[4],\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[5],\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[6],\n                tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[7]\n            ];\n\n            tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[0] = tempColorArray[7];\n            tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[1] = tempColorArray[0];\n            tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[2] = tempColorArray[1];\n            tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[3] = tempColorArray[2];\n            tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[4] = tempColorArray[3];\n            tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[5] = tempColorArray[4];\n            tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[6] = tempColorArray[5];\n            tdLoadingBox.arrayColors[7] = tempColorArray[6];\n\n            if(tdLoadingBox.statusAnimation === 'display') {\n\n\n                setTimeout(tdLoadingBox.render, tdLoadingBox.speed);\n            } else {\n                tdLoadingBox.animationDisplay('');\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        //display the animation\n        animationDisplay: function (animation_str) {\n            jQuery('.td-loader-gif').html(animation_str);\n        },\n\n\n        //converts hex to rgba\n        hexToRgb: function (hex) {\n            var result = /^#?([a-f\\d]{2})([a-f\\d]{2})([a-f\\d]{2})$/i.exec(hex);\n\n            return result ? {\n                r: parseInt(result[1], 16),\n                g: parseInt(result[2], 16),\n                b: parseInt(result[3], 16)\n            } : null;\n        }\n    }; //tdLoadingBox.init();//tdLoadingBox.stop();\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdAjaxSearch = {};\n\njQuery().ready(function() {\n\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdAjaxSearch.init();\n\n});\n\n(function() {\n\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdAjaxSearch = {\n\n        // private vars\n        _current_selection_index: 0,\n        _last_request_results_count: 0,\n        _first_down_up: true,\n        _is_search_open: false,\n\n\n        \n        init: function init() {\n\n            // hide the drop down if we click outside of it\n            jQuery(document).click(function(e) {\n                if (\n                    'td-icon-search' !== e.target.className &&\n                    'td-header-search' !== e.target.id &&\n                    'td-header-search-top' !== e.target.id &&\n                    true === tdAjaxSearch._is_search_open\n                ) {\n                    tdAjaxSearch.hide_search_box();\n                }\n            });\n\n\n            // show and hide the drop down on the search icon\n            jQuery( '#td-header-search-button' ).click(function(event){\n                event.preventDefault();\n                if (tdAjaxSearch._is_search_open === true) {\n                    tdAjaxSearch.hide_search_box();\n\n                } else {\n                    tdAjaxSearch.show_search_box();\n                }\n            });\n\n\n            // show and hide the drop down on the search icon for mobile\n            jQuery( '#td-header-search-button-mob' ).click(function(event){\n                jQuery( 'body' ).addClass( 'td-search-opened' );\n\n                var current_query = jQuery('#td-header-search-mob').val().trim();\n                if ( current_query.length > 0 ) {\n                    tdAjaxSearch.do_ajax_call_mob();\n                }\n            });\n\n\n            //close the search\n            jQuery( '.td-search-close a' ).click(function(){\n                jQuery( 'body' ).removeClass( 'td-search-opened' );\n            });\n\n\n            // keydown on the text box\n            jQuery( '#td-header-search' ).keydown(function(event) {\n                if (\n                    ( event.which && 39 === event.which ) ||\n                    ( event.keyCode && 39 === event.keyCode ) ||\n                    ( event.which && 37 === event.which ) ||\n                    ( event.keyCode && 37 === event.keyCode ) )\n                {\n                    //do nothing on left and right arrows\n                    tdAjaxSearch.td_aj_search_input_focus();\n                    return;\n                }\n\n                if ( ( event.which && 13 === event.which ) || ( event.keyCode && 13 === event.keyCode ) ) {\n                    // on enter\n                    var td_aj_cur_element = jQuery('.td-aj-cur-element');\n                    if (td_aj_cur_element.length > 0) {\n                        //alert('ra');\n                        var td_go_to_url = td_aj_cur_element.find('.entry-title a').attr('href');\n                        window.location = td_go_to_url;\n                    } else {\n                        jQuery(this).parent().parent().submit();\n                    }\n                    return false; //redirect for search on enter\n\n                } else if ( ( event.which && 40 === event.which ) || ( event.keyCode && 40 === event.keyCode ) ) {\n                    // down\n                    tdAjaxSearch.move_prompt_down();\n                    return false; //disable the envent\n\n                } else if ( ( event.which && 38 === event.which ) || ( event.keyCode && 38 === event.keyCode ) ) {\n                    //up\n                    tdAjaxSearch.move_prompt_up();\n                    return false; //disable the envent\n\n                } else {\n                    //for backspace we have to check if the search query is empty and if so, clear the list\n                    if ( ( event.which && 8 === event.which ) || ( event.keyCode && 8 === event.keyCode ) ) {\n                        //if we have just one character left, that means it will be deleted now and we also have to clear the search results list\n                        var search_query = jQuery(this).val();\n                        if ( 1 === search_query.length ) {\n                            jQuery('#td-aj-search').empty();\n                        }\n                    }\n\n                    //various keys\n                    tdAjaxSearch.td_aj_search_input_focus();\n                    //jQuery('#td-aj-search').empty();\n                    setTimeout(function(){\n                        tdAjaxSearch.do_ajax_call();\n                    }, 100);\n                }\n                return true;\n            });\n\n            // keydown on the text box\n            jQuery('#td-header-search-mob').keydown(function(event) {\n\n                if ( ( event.which && 13 === event.which ) || ( event.keyCode && 13 === event.keyCode ) ) {\n                    // on enter\n                    var td_aj_cur_element = jQuery('.td-aj-cur-element');\n                    if (td_aj_cur_element.length > 0) {\n                        //alert('ra');\n                        var td_go_to_url = td_aj_cur_element.find( '.entry-title a' ).attr( 'href' );\n                        window.location = td_go_to_url;\n                    } else {\n                        jQuery(this).parent().parent().submit();\n                    }\n                    return false; //redirect for search on enter\n                } else {\n\n                    //for backspace we have to check if the search query is empty and if so, clear the list\n                    if ( ( event.which && 8 === event.which ) || ( event.keyCode && 8 === event.keyCode ) ) {\n                        //if we have just one character left, that means it will be deleted now and we also have to clear the search results list\n                        var search_query = jQuery(this).val();\n                        if ( 1 === search_query.length ) {\n                            jQuery('#td-aj-search-mob').empty();\n                        }\n                    }\n\n                    setTimeout(function(){\n                        tdAjaxSearch.do_ajax_call_mob();\n                    }, 100);\n\n                    return true;\n                }\n            });\n        },\n\n\n        show_search_box: function() {\n            jQuery( '.td-drop-down-search' ).addClass( 'td-drop-down-search-open' );\n            // do not try to autofocus on ios. It's still buggy as of 18 march 2015\n            if ( true !== tdDetect.isIos ) {\n                setTimeout(function(){\n                    document.getElementById( 'td-header-search' ).focus();\n                }, 200);\n            }\n            tdAjaxSearch._is_search_open = true;\n        },\n\n\n        hide_search_box: function hide_search_box() {\n            jQuery(\".td-drop-down-search\").removeClass('td-drop-down-search-open');\n            tdAjaxSearch._is_search_open = false;\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        td_aj_search_move_prompt_up: function() {\n            if (tdAjaxSearch._first_down_up === true) {\n                tdAjaxSearch._first_down_up = false;\n                if (tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index === 0) {\n                    tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index = tdAjaxSearch._last_request_results_count - 1;\n                } else {\n                    tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index--;\n                }\n            } else {\n                if (tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index === 0) {\n                    tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index = tdAjaxSearch._last_request_results_count;\n                } else {\n                    tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index--;\n                }\n            }\n            tdAjaxSearch._repaintCurrentElement();\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        move_prompt_down: function() {\n            if (tdAjaxSearch._first_down_up === true) {\n                tdAjaxSearch._first_down_up = false;\n            } else {\n                if (tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index === tdAjaxSearch._last_request_results_count) {\n                    tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index = 0;\n                } else {\n                    tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index++;\n                }\n            }\n            tdAjaxSearch._repaintCurrentElement();\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _repaintCurrentElement: function() {\n            jQuery( '.td_module_wrap' ).removeClass( 'td-aj-cur-element' );\n\n            if (tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index > tdAjaxSearch._last_request_results_count - 1 ) {\n                //the input is selected\n                jQuery( '.td-search-form' ).fadeTo( 100, 1 );\n            } else {\n                tdAjaxSearch.td_aj_search_input_remove_focus();\n                jQuery( '.td_module_wrap' ).eq( tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index ).addClass( 'td-aj-cur-element' );\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        \n        td_aj_search_input_focus: function() {\n            tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index = 0;\n            tdAjaxSearch._first_down_up = true;\n            jQuery( '.td-search-form' ).fadeTo( 100, 1 );\n            jQuery( '.td_module_wrap' ).removeClass( 'td-aj-cur-element' );\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        td_aj_search_input_remove_focus: function() {\n            if ( 0 !== tdAjaxSearch._last_request_results_count ) {\n                jQuery( '.td-search-form' ).css( 'opacity', 0.5 );\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        process_ajax_response: function(data) {\n            var current_query = jQuery( '#td-header-search' ).val();\n\n            //the search is empty - drop results\n            if ( '' === current_query ) {\n                jQuery( '#td-aj-search' ).empty();\n                return;\n            }\n\n            var td_data_object = jQuery.parseJSON(data); //get the data object\n            //drop the result - it's from a old query\n            if ( td_data_object.td_search_query !== current_query ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            //reset the current selection and total posts\n            tdAjaxSearch._current_selection_index = 0;\n            tdAjaxSearch._last_request_results_count = td_data_object.td_total_in_list;\n            tdAjaxSearch._first_down_up = true;\n\n            //update the query\n            jQuery( '#td-aj-search' ).html( td_data_object.td_data );\n\n            \n\n            // the .entry-thumb are searched for in the #td-aj-search object, sorted and added into the view port array items\n            if ( ( 'undefined' !== typeof window.tdAnimationStack )  && ( true === window.tdAnimationStack.activated ) ) {\n                window.tdAnimationStack.check_for_new_items( '#td-aj-search .td-animation-stack', window.tdAnimationStack.SORTED_METHOD.sort_left_to_right, true );\n                window.tdAnimationStack.compute_items();\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        \n        process_ajax_response_mob: function(data) {\n            var current_query = jQuery( '#td-header-search-mob' ).val();\n\n            //the search is empty - drop results\n            if ( '' === current_query ) {\n                jQuery('#td-aj-search-mob').empty();\n                return;\n            }\n\n            var td_data_object = jQuery.parseJSON( data ); //get the data object\n            //drop the result - it's from a old query\n            if ( td_data_object.td_search_query !== current_query ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            //update the query\n            jQuery( '#td-aj-search-mob' ).html( td_data_object.td_data );\n\n            // the .entry-thumb are searched for in the #td-aj-search-mob object, sorted and added into the view port array items\n            if ( ( 'undefined' !== typeof window.tdAnimationStack )  && ( true === window.tdAnimationStack.activated ) ) {\n                window.tdAnimationStack.check_for_new_items( '#td-aj-search-mob .td-animation-stack', window.tdAnimationStack.SORTED_METHOD.sort_left_to_right, true );\n                window.tdAnimationStack.compute_items();\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        \n        do_ajax_call: function() {\n            var search_query = jQuery('#td-header-search').val();\n\n            if ( '' === search_query ) {\n                tdAjaxSearch.td_aj_search_input_focus();\n                return;\n            }\n\n            //do we have a cache hit\n            if (tdLocalCache.exist(search_query)) {\n                tdAjaxSearch.process_ajax_response(tdLocalCache.get(search_query));\n                return; //cache HIT\n            }\n\n            //fk no cache hit - do the real request\n\n            jQuery.ajax({\n                type: 'POST',\n                url: td_ajax_url,\n                data: {\n                    action: 'td_ajax_search',\n                    td_string: search_query\n                },\n                success: function(data, textStatus, XMLHttpRequest){\n                    tdLocalCache.set(search_query, data);\n                    tdAjaxSearch.process_ajax_response(data);\n                },\n                error: function(MLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown){\n                    //console.log(errorThrown);\n                }\n            });\n        },\n\n\n        \n        do_ajax_call_mob: function() {\n            var search_query = jQuery( '#td-header-search-mob' ).val();\n\n            if ( '' === search_query) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            //do we have a cache hit\n            if ( tdLocalCache.exist( search_query ) ) {\n                tdAjaxSearch.process_ajax_response_mob( tdLocalCache.get( search_query ) );\n                return; //cache HIT\n            }\n\n            //fk no cache hit - do the real request\n\n            jQuery.ajax({\n                type: 'POST',\n                url: td_ajax_url,\n                data: {\n                    action: 'td_ajax_search',\n                    td_string: search_query\n                },\n                success: function( data, textStatus, XMLHttpRequest ){\n                    tdLocalCache.set( search_query, data );\n                    tdAjaxSearch.process_ajax_response_mob( data );\n                },\n                error: function( MLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown ){\n                    //console.log(errorThrown);\n                }\n            });\n        }\n    };\n\n})();\n\n;'use strict';\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\njQuery().ready(function() {\n\n    //handles the modal images\n    tdModalImage();\n\n    //move classes from post images to figure - td-post-image-full etc\n    tdUtil.imageMoveClassToFigure( 'td-post-image-full' );\n    tdUtil.imageMoveClassToFigure( 'td-post-image-right' );\n    tdUtil.imageMoveClassToFigure( 'td-post-image-left' );\n\n    \n    if ( ( 'undefined' !== typeof window.tds_general_modal_image ) && ( '' !== window.tds_general_modal_image ) ) {\n        jQuery( '.single .td-post-content a > img' ).filter(function( index, element ) {\n            if ( -1 !== element.className.indexOf( 'wp-image' ) ) {\n                jQuery( element ).parent().addClass( 'td-modal-image' );\n            }\n        });\n    }\n});\n\n\n\n// used for scrolling to the last element\nvar tdModalImageLastEl = '';\n\n// handles modal images for: Featured images, inline image, inline image with caption, galleries\nfunction tdModalImage() {\n\n    //fix wordpress figure + figcaption (we move the figcaption in the data-caption attribute of the link)\n    jQuery( 'figure.wp-caption' ).each(function() {\n        var caption_text = jQuery( this ).children( 'figcaption' ).html();\n        jQuery( this ).children( 'a' ).data( 'caption', caption_text );\n    });\n\n    //move td-modal-image class to the parent a from the image. We can only add this class to the image via word press media editor\n    jQuery( '.td-modal-image' ).each(function() {\n        jQuery( this ).parent().addClass( 'td-modal-image' );\n        jQuery( this ).removeClass( 'td-modal-image' );\n    });\n\n\n\n    //popup on modal images in articles\n    jQuery( 'article' ).magnificPopup({\n        type: 'image',\n        delegate: \".td-modal-image\",\n        gallery: {\n            enabled: true,\n            tPrev: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_tPrev' ), // Alt text on left arrow\n            tNext: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_tNext' ), // Alt text on right arrow\n            tCounter: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_tCounter' ) // Markup for \"1 of 7\" counter\n        },\n        ajax: {\n            tError: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_ajax_tError' )\n        },\n        image: {\n            tError: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_image_tError' ),\n            titleSrc: function( item ) {//console.log(item.el);\n                //alert(jQuery(item.el).data(\"caption\"));\n                var td_current_caption = jQuery( item.el ).data( 'caption' );\n                if ( 'undefined' !== typeof td_current_caption ) {\n                    return td_current_caption;\n                } else {\n                    return '';\n                }\n            }\n        },\n        zoom: {\n            enabled: true,\n            duration: 300,\n            opener: function( element ) {\n                return element.find( 'img' );\n            }\n        },\n        callbacks: {\n            change: function( item ) {\n                tdModalImageLastEl = item.el;\n                //setTimeout(function(){\n                tdUtil.scrollIntoView( item.el );\n                //}, 100);\n            },\n            beforeClose: function() {\n                tdAffix.allow_scroll = false;\n\n                tdUtil.scrollIntoView( tdModalImageLastEl );\n\n                var interval_td_affix_scroll = setInterval(function() {\n\n                    if ( ! tdIsScrollingAnimation ) {\n                        clearInterval( interval_td_affix_scroll );\n                        setTimeout(function() {\n                            tdAffix.allow_scroll = true;\n                            //tdAffix.td_events_scroll(td_events.scroll_window_scrollTop);\n                        }, 100 );\n                    }\n                }, 100 );\n            }\n        }\n    });\n\n\n\n\n\n    //gallery popup\n    //detect jetpack carousel and disable the theme popup\n    if ( 'undefined' === typeof jetpackCarouselStrings ) {\n\n        // copy gallery caption from figcaption to data-caption attribute of the link to the full image, in this way the modal can read the caption\n        jQuery( 'figure.gallery-item' ).each(function() {\n            var caption_text = jQuery( this ).children( 'figcaption' ).html();\n            jQuery( this ).find( 'a' ).data( 'caption', caption_text );\n        });\n\n\n        //jquery tiled gallery\n tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_ajax_tError' )\n            },\n            image: {\n                tError: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_image_tError' ),\n                titleSrc: function( item ) {//console.log(item.el);\n                    var td_current_caption = jQuery( item.el ).parent().find( '.tiled-gallery-caption' ).text();\n                    if ( 'undefined' !== typeof td_current_caption ) {\n                        return td_current_caption;\n                    } else {\n                        return '';\n                    }\n                }\n            },\n            zoom: {\n                enabled: true,\n                duration: 300,\n                opener: function( element ) {\n                    return element.find( 'img' );\n                }\n            },\n            callbacks: {\n                change: function( item ) {\n                    tdModalImageLastEl = item.el;\n                    tdUtil.scrollIntoView( item.el );\n                },\n                beforeClose: function() {\n                    tdUtil.scrollIntoView( tdModalImageLastEl );\n                }\n            }\n        });\n\n\n\n        jQuery( '.gallery' ).magnificPopup({\n            type: 'image',\n            delegate: '.gallery-icon > a',\n            gallery: {\n                enabled: true,\n                tPrev: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_tPrev' ), // Alt text on left arrow\n                tNext: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'td_magnific_popup_translation_tNext' ), // Alt text              }\n                }\n            },\n            zoom: {\n                enabled: true,\n                duration: 300,\n                opener: function( element ) {\n                    return element.find( 'img' );\n                }\n            },\n            callbacks: {\n                change: function( item ) {\n                    tdModalImageLastEl = item.el;\n                    tdUtil.scrollIntoView( item.el );\n                },\n                beforeClose: function() {\n                    tdUtil.scrollIntoView( tdModalImageLastEl );\n                }\n
