td_set_cookies_life( ['td_show_panel', 'hide', 86400000] );//86400000 is the number of milliseconds in a day\n\n\n        } else {\n            // open\n            jQueryObj.removeClass( 'td-ts-closed-no-transition' ); // remove the remove transition class :)\n\n\n            jQueryObj.addClass( 'td-theme-settings-small' );\n            jQueryObj.removeClass( 'td-theme-settings-closed' );\n            $this.html( 'CLOSE' );\n            td_set_cookies_life( ['td_show_panel', 'show', 86400000] );//86400000 is the number of milliseconds in a day\n        }\n    });\n\n\n}); //end on load\n\n\n\n\n//global object that holds each `trending-now-wrapper` list of posts\n//var td_trending_now_object = {};\n\nvar tdTrendingNowObject = {};\n\n(function() {\n\n    \"use strict\";\n\n    tdTrendingNowObject = {\n\n        trendingNowAutostartBlocks: [],\n\n        //trending now function : creates the array of posts in each trend and add events to the nav buttons\n        tdTrendingNow: function() {\n\n            //move thru all `trending-now-wrapper's` on the page\n            jQuery('.td-trending-now-wrapper').each(function() {\n                var wrapperId = jQuery(this).attr('id');\n                var wrapperIdNavigation = jQuery(this).data('start');\n\n                if ('manual' !== wrapperIdNavigation) {\n                    tdTrendingNowObject.trendingNowAutostartBlocks.push(wrapperId);\n                }\n\n                var trendingListPosts = [];\n                var iCont = 0;\n\n                //take the text from each post from current trending-now-wrapper\n                jQuery('#' + wrapperId + ' .td-trending-now-post').each(function() {\n                    //trending_list_posts[i_cont] = jQuery(this)[0].outerHTML;\n                    trendingListPosts[iCont] = jQuery(this);\n\n                    //increment the counter\n                    iCont++;\n                });\n\n                //add this array to `tdTrendingNowObject`\n                tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperId] = trendingListPosts;\n                tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperId + '_position'] = 0;\n            });\n\n            jQuery('.td-trending-now-nav-left').click( function(event) {\n                event.preventDefault();\n                var wrapperIdForNav = jQuery(this).data('wrapper-id');\n\n                // if there's just a single post to be shown, there's no need for next/prev/autostart\n                if ((undefined !== wrapperIdForNav) && (1 >= tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav].length))  {\n                    return;\n                }\n\n                //var data_moving = jQuery(this).data('moving');\n                var controlStart = jQuery(this).data('control-start');\n\n                \n                if ('manual' !== controlStart) {\n                    clearInterval(tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav + '_timer']);\n                    tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav + '_timer'] = setInterval(function() {\n                        tdTrendingNowObject.tdTrendingNowChangeText([wrapperIdForNav, 'left'], true);\n                    }, 3000);\n                }\n\n\n                //call to change the text\n                tdTrendingNowObject.tdTrendingNowChangeText([wrapperIdForNav, 'right'], false);\n            });\n\n\n            jQuery('.td-trending-now-nav-right').click(function(event) {\n                event.preventDefault();\n                var wrapperIdForNav = jQuery(this).data('wrapper-id');\n\n                // if there's just a single post to be shown, there's no need for next/prev/autostart\n                if ((undefined !== wrapperIdForNav) && (1 >= tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav].length)) {\n                    return;\n                }\n\n                //var data_moving = jQuery(this).data('moving');\n                var controlStart = jQuery(this).data('control-start');\n\n                \n                if ('manual' !== controlStart) {\n                    clearInterval(tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav + '_timer']);\n                    tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav + '_timer'] = setInterval(function() {\n                        tdTrendingNowObject.tdTrendingNowChangeText([wrapperIdForNav, 'left' ], true);\n                    }, 3000);\n                }\n\n                //call to change the text\n                tdTrendingNowObject.tdTrendingNowChangeText([wrapperIdForNav, 'left'], true);\n            });\n\n            //console.log(tdTrendingNowObject);\n        },\n\n\n        \n        tdTrendingNowChangeText: function(array_param, to_right) {\n\n            //for consistency use the same variables names as thh parent function\n            var wrapperIdForNav = array_param[0];\n            var dataMoving = array_param[1];\n\n            //get the list of post and position for this trending now block\n            var postsArrayListForThisTrend = tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav];\n\n\n            // the following method is not so good because using it, many timers are already created\n            //\n            // if there's just a single post to be shown, there's no need for next/prev/autostart\n            //if (posts_array_list_for_this_trend.length <= 1) {\n            //    return;\n            //}\n\n            var postsArrayListPosition = tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav + '_position'];\n\n            var previousPostArrayListPosition = postsArrayListPosition;\n\n            //count how many post are in the list\n            var post_count = postsArrayListForThisTrend.length - 1;\n\n            if ('left' === dataMoving) {\n                postsArrayListPosition += 1;\n\n                if (postsArrayListPosition > post_count) {\n                    postsArrayListPosition = 0;\n                }\n\n            } else {\n                postsArrayListPosition -= 1;\n\n                if (postsArrayListPosition < 0) {\n                    postsArrayListPosition = post_count;\n                }\n            }\n\n            //update the new position in the global `tdTrendingNowObject`\n            tdTrendingNowObject[wrapperIdForNav + '_position'] = postsArrayListPosition;\n\n            postsArrayListForThisTrend[previousPostArrayListPosition].css('opacity', 0);\n            postsArrayListForThisTrend[previousPostArrayListPosition].css('z-index', 0);\n\n            for (var trending_post in postsArrayListForThisTrend) {\n                if (true === postsArrayListForThisTrend.hasOwnProperty(trending_post)) {\n                    postsArrayListForThisTrend[trending_post].removeClass('td_animated_xlong td_fadeInLeft td_fadeInRight td_fadeOutLeft td_fadeOutRight');\n                }\n            }\n\n            postsArrayListForThisTrend[postsArrayListPosition].css('opacity', 1);\n            postsArrayListForThisTrend[postsArrayListPosition].css('z-index', 1);\n\n            if (true === to_right) {\n\n                postsArrayListForThisTrend[previousPostArrayListPosition].addClass('td_animated_xlong td_fadeOutLeft');\n                postsArrayListForThisTrend[postsArrayListPosition].addClass('td_animated_xlong td_fadeInRight');\n            } else {\n\n                postsArrayListForThisTrend[previousPostArrayListPosition].addClass('td_animated_xlong td_fadeOutRight');\n                postsArrayListForThisTrend[postsArrayListPosition].addClass('td_animated_xlong td_fadeInLeft');\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        //trending now function to auto start\n        tdTrendingNowAutoStart: function() {\n\n            var list = tdTrendingNowObject.trendingNowAutostartBlocks;\n\n            for (var i = 0, len = list.length; i < len; i += 1) {\n\n                // if there's just a single post to be shown, there's no need for next/prev/autostart\n                if (1 >= tdTrendingNowObject[list[i]].length) {\n                    return;\n                }\n\n                tdTrendingNowObject[list[i] + '_timer'] = tdTrendingNowObject.setTimerChangingText(list[i]);\n            }\n        },\n\n        setTimerChangingText: function(autoStartItem) {\n            return setInterval(function () {\n                //console.log(i + \"=>\" + list[i] + \"\\n\");\n                tdTrendingNowObject.tdTrendingNowChangeText([autoStartItem, 'left'], true);\n            }, 3000);\n        }\n    };\n\n})();\n\"use strict\";\n\n\n\n\nvar td_history = {\n    td_history_change_event: false,\n\n    // static class init\n    init: function() {\n        //hook the popstate event\n        window.addEventListener('popstate', function(event) {\n            td_history.td_history_change_event = true;\n            if (typeof(event.state) != \"undefined\" && event.state != null) {\n                jQuery(\"#\" + event.state.slide_id).iosSlider(\"goToSlide\", event.state.current_slide);\n            }\n        });\n    },\n\n\n    \n    replace_history_entry: function (data) {\n        if (tdDetect.hasHistory === false) {\n            return; //no history support\n        }\n        history.replaceState(data, null);\n    },\n\n\n    \n    add_history_entry: function (data, query_parm_id, query_parm_value) {\n\n        if (tdDetect.hasHistory === false) {\n            return; //no history support\n        }\n\n\n        if (query_parm_value == '') {\n            history.pushState(data, null,  null); //add the hash via history api\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // @todo - detect other types of pages ex: ?page_id\n        var td_query_page_id = td_history.get_query_parameter('p');\n        if (td_query_page_id != '') {\n            //no mod rewrite, we go with ?p= etc\n            if (query_parm_value == 1) {\n                history.pushState(data, null,  '?p=' + td_query_page_id); //remove the parm for the first item\n            } else {\n                history.pushState(data, null,  '?p=' + td_query_page_id + '&' + query_parm_id + '=' + query_parm_value); //add the hash via history api\n            }\n\n        } else {\n            //mod rewrite\n            if (query_parm_value == 1) {\n                history.pushState(data, null, td_history.get_mod_rewrite_base_url()); //add the hash via history api\n            } else {\n                history.pushState(data, null, td_history.get_mod_rewrite_base_url() + query_parm_value + '/'); //add the hash via history api\n            }\n        }\n\n    },\n\n\n\n    \n    get_mod_rewrite_base_url: function () {\n        var full_url = document.URL;\n\n        //trim the last \"/\" in the url\n        if (full_url.charAt(full_url.length - 1) == '/') {\n            full_url = full_url.slice(0, - 1);\n        }\n\n        if (td_history.get_mod_rewrite_pagination(document.URL) === false) {\n            // no pagination present\n            return document.URL;\n        }\n\n        // we have pagination so we have to parse the url to remove it\n        return full_url.substring(0, full_url.lastIndexOf(\"/\"))+ '/';\n\n    },\n\n\n\n    \n    get_mod_rewrite_pagination: function () {\n        var full_url = document.URL;\n\n        //trim the last \"/\" in the url\n        if (full_url.charAt(full_url.length - 1) == '/') {\n            full_url = full_url.slice(0, - 1);\n        }\n\n        var last_url_parameter = full_url.substring(full_url.lastIndexOf(\"/\")+1, full_url.length);\n\n        // return the page if it's indeed an integer\n        if (td_history.isInt(last_url_parameter)) {\n            return last_url_parameter;\n        }\n\n        //return false if we don't have a page\n        return false;\n    },\n\n\n    \n    get_current_page: function (query_parm_id) {\n        var td_query_page_id = td_history.get_query_parameter('p');\n        if (td_query_page_id != '') {\n            //no mod rewrite, we go with ?p= etc\n            var cur_page = td_history.get_query_parameter(query_parm_id);\n            if (cur_page != '') {\n                return cur_page;\n            } else {\n                return 1;\n            }\n        } else {\n            //mod rewrite\n            var cur_page = td_history.get_mod_rewrite_pagination();\n            if (cur_page !== false) {\n                return cur_page;\n            } else {\n                return 1;\n            }\n        }\n    },\n\n\n    \n    isInt: function (n) {\n        return n % 1 === 0;\n    },\n\n\n    \n    get_query_parameter: function (name) {\n        name = name.replace(/[\\[]/, \"\\\\[\").replace(/[\\]]/, \"\\\\]\");\n        var regex = new RegExp(\"[\\\\?&]\" + name + \"=([^&#]*)\"),\n            results = regex.exec(location.search);\n        return results == null ? \"\" : decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\\+/g, \" \"));\n    },\n\n    \n    slide_changed_callback: function(args) {\n        //do not add another history entry if the slide moved due to the history change event\n        if (td_history.td_history_change_event === true) {\n            td_history.td_history_change_event = false;\n            return;\n        }\n        var current_slide = args.currentSlideNumber;\n        var slide_id = args.sliderContainerObject.attr('id');\n\n        td_history.add_history_entry({current_slide:current_slide, slide_id:slide_id}, 'slide', current_slide);\n    }\n\n};\n\n\nif (window.history && window.history.pushState) {\n    td_history.init();\n}\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdSmartSidebar = {};\n\n(function(){\n\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdSmartSidebar = {\n        hasItems: false, // this class will only work when this flag is true. If we don't have any items, all the calculations on scroll will be disabled by this flag\n        items: [], //the array that has all the items\n        scroll_window_scrollTop_last: 0, //last scrollTop position, used to calculate the scroll direction\n\n\n        tds_snap_menu: tdUtil.getBackendVar( 'tds_snap_menu' ),   //read the snap menu setting from theme panel\n\n\n        \n        is_enabled: true, //if the smart sidebar is not needed (ex on mobile) put this flag to true\n        is_enabled_state_run_once: false, // make sure that we dun enable and disable only once\n        is_disabled_state_run_once: false,\n\n\n        is_tablet_grid: false, //we detect if the current grid is the tablet portrait one\n\n\n        _view_port_current_interval_index: tdViewport.getCurrentIntervalIndex(),\n\n\n        item: function() {\n            this.content_jquery_obj = '';\n            this.sidebar_jquery_obj = '';\n\n\n            // the position variables\n            this.sidebar_top = 0;\n            this.sidebar_bottom = 0;\n            this.sidebar_height = 0;\n\n\n            this.content_top = 0;\n            this.content_bottom = 0;\n\n            // the sidebar state\n            this.sidebar_state = '';\n\n            this.case_1_run_once = false;\n            this.case_2_run_once = false;\n            this.case_3_run_once = false;\n            this.case_3_last_sidebar_height = 0; // case 3 has to be recalculated if the sidebar height changes\n            this.case_3_last_content_height = 0; // recalculate case 3 if content height has changed\n            this.case_4_run_once = false;\n            this.case_4_last_menu_offset = 0;\n            this.case_5_run_once = false;\n            this.case_6_run_once = false;\n        },\n\n\n        //add item to the array\n        add_item: function( item ) {\n            tdSmartSidebar.hasItems = true; //put the flag that we have items\n\n            \n            item.sidebar_jquery_obj\n                .prepend( '<div class=\"clearfix\"></div>' )\n                .append( '<div class=\"clearfix\"></div>' );\n\n            item.content_jquery_obj\n                .prepend( '<div class=\"clearfix\"></div>' )\n                .append( '<div class=\"clearfix\"></div>' );\n\n\n            tdSmartSidebar.items.push( item );\n        },\n\n\n        td_events_scroll: function( scrollTop ) {\n\n\n            // we don't have any smart sidebars, return\n            if ( false === tdSmartSidebar.hasItems ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            // check if the smart sidebar is enabled ( the sidebar can be enabled / disabled on runtime )\n            if ( false === tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled ) {\n\n                if ( false === tdSmartSidebar.is_disabled_state_run_once ) { // this call runs only ONCE / state change - we don't want any code to run on mobile\n                    tdSmartSidebar.is_disabled_state_run_once = true;\n                    for ( var item_index = 0; item_index < tdSmartSidebar.items.length; item_index++ ) {\n                        tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].sidebar_jquery_obj.css({\n                            width: 'auto',\n                            position: 'static',\n                            top: 'auto',\n                            bottom: 'auto'\n                        });\n                    }\n                    tdSmartSidebar.log( 'smart_sidebar_disabled' );\n                }\n\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            // all is done in an animation frame\n            window.requestAnimationFrame(function() {\n\n\n                \n                var td_affix_menu_computed_height = 0;\n                if ( '' !== tdSmartSidebar.tds_snap_menu ) { // if the menu is not snapping in any way - do not calculate this\n\n                    // The main_menu_height was replaced with the _get_menu_affix_height(), because we need the size of the\n                    // affix menu. In the 'Newspaper' the menu has different sizes when it is affix 'on' and 'off'.\n                    td_affix_menu_computed_height = tdAffix._get_menu_affix_height();\n\n                    // Menu offset value is added when we are on 'smart_snap_always' case\n                    if ('smart_snap_always' === tdAffix.tds_snap_menu) {\n                        td_affix_menu_computed_height += tdAffix.menu_offset;\n                    }\n                }\n                // The following height is added just for Newspaper theme.\n                // In the Newsmag theme, the sidebar elements have already a 'padding-top' of 20px\n\n                if ( ( 'undefined' !== typeof window.tdThemeName ) && ( 'Newspaper' === window.tdThemeName ) ) {\n                    td_affix_menu_computed_height += 20;\n                }\n\n\n\n\n\n                // compute the scrolling direction\n                var scroll_direction = '';\n                //check the direction\n                if ( scrollTop !== tdSmartSidebar.scroll_window_scrollTop_last ) { // compute direction only if we have different last scroll top\n                    // compute the direction of the scroll\n                    if ( scrollTop > tdSmartSidebar.scroll_window_scrollTop_last ) {\n                        scroll_direction = 'down';\n                    } else {\n                        scroll_direction = 'up';\n                    }\n                }\n                tdSmartSidebar.scroll_window_scrollTop_last = scrollTop;\n\n\n\n                \n\n\n\n                var view_port_height = jQuery( window ).height(); // ~ we can get this only once + on resize\n                var view_port_bottom = scrollTop + view_port_height;\n\n                scrollTop = scrollTop + td_affix_menu_computed_height;\n\n                // go in all the sidebar items\n                for ( var item_index = 0; item_index < tdSmartSidebar.items.length; item_index++ ) {\n\n                    var cur_item_ref = tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ];\n\n                    cur_item_ref.content_top = cur_item_ref.content_jquery_obj.offset().top;\n                    cur_item_ref.content_height = cur_item_ref.content_jquery_obj.height();\n                    cur_item_ref.content_bottom = cur_item_ref.content_top + cur_item_ref.content_height;\n\n                    cur_item_ref.sidebar_top = cur_item_ref.sidebar_jquery_obj.offset().top;\n                    cur_item_ref.sidebar_height = cur_item_ref.sidebar_jquery_obj.height();\n                    cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom = cur_item_ref.sidebar_top + cur_item_ref.sidebar_height;\n\n\n\n\n\n                    \n                    if ( cur_item_ref.content_height <= cur_item_ref.sidebar_height ) {\n                        cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_6_content_too_small';\n\n\n\n                        \n\n                    } else if ( cur_item_ref.sidebar_height < view_port_height ) {\n\n                        // ref value used to compare the scroll top\n                        var ref_value = cur_item_ref.content_top;\n\n                        // For 'Newsmag' the ref value is incremented with td_affix_menu_computed_height\n                        // It solves a case when the affix menu leaves the 'case_2_top_of_content' phase to 'case_4_fixed_up' too early\n                        // It's because of how the grid, and smart sidebar, are built on Newspaper vs Newsmag\n                        if ( ! tdAffix.is_menu_affix && ( 'undefined' !== typeof window.tdThemeName ) && ( 'Newsmag' === window.tdThemeName ) && ( 'smart_snap_always' === tdAffix.tds_snap_menu ) ) {\n                            ref_value += td_affix_menu_computed_height;\n                        }\n\n                        //if (tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal(scrollTop, cur_item_ref.content_top)) {\n                        if ( tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal( scrollTop, ref_value ) ) {\n                            // not affix - we did not scroll to reach the sidebar\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_2_top_of_content';\n                        }\n\n                        // [1] if the sidebar is visible and we have enough space in the sidebar, place it at the top affix top\n                        // [2] if the sidebar is above the view port and nothing is visible, place the sidebar at the bottom of the column\n\n                        else if ( true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller( cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom, scrollTop ) ) {\n                            if ( tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller( scrollTop, cur_item_ref.content_bottom - cur_item_ref.sidebar_height ) ) { //this is a special case where on the initial load, the bottom of the content is visible and we have a lot of space to show the widget at the top affixed.\n                                cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_4_fixed_up'; // [1]87\n                            } else {\n                                cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_3_bottom_of_content'; // [2]\n                            }\n\n\n                        } else {\n\n                            // affix\n                            if ( tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal( cur_item_ref.content_bottom, cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom ) ) { // check to see if we reached the bottom of the content / row\n                                if ( 'up' === scroll_direction && tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal( scrollTop, cur_item_ref.sidebar_top ) ) {\n                                    cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_4_fixed_up'; // get out of the case_3_bottom_of_content state\n                                } else {\n                                    cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_3_bottom_of_content';\n                                }\n\n                            } else {\n                                if ( cur_item_ref.content_bottom - scrollTop >= cur_item_ref.sidebar_height ) {\n                                    // Make sure that we have space for the sidebar to affix it to the top\n                                    cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_4_fixed_up';  // we are not at the bottom of the content\n                                } else {\n\n                                    // this case isn't reached. It's accomplish by the tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal(cur_item_ref.content_bottom, cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom) case\n\n                                    cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_3_bottom_of_content';\n                                }\n                                //console.log(cur_item_ref.content_bottom + ' >= ' +  cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom); //@todo fix this case pe ? @20may2016 era un url aici dar l-am sters din motive de securitate\n                            }\n                        }\n\n\n\n                        \n\n\n                    } else {\n\n                        //// if the sidebar is above the view port and nothing is visible, place the sidebar at the bottom of the column\n                        //if (tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller(cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom, scrollTop) === true) {\n                        //    cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_3_bottom_of_content';\n                        //    tdSmartSidebar.log(cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom + ' ~ ' + scrollTop);\n                        //}\n\n\n                        // if the sidebar is above the view port and nothing is visible, place the sidebar fixed up if it's smaller than the viewport,\n                        //      fixed down, meaning that a possible previous operation could be 'scroll down'\n                        // if none of the above operations meets the conditions, the sidebar is placed at the bottom of the content\n                        if ( true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller( cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom, scrollTop ) ) {\n\n                            if ( true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal(scrollTop, cur_item_ref.sidebar_top ) &&\n\n                                true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal( cur_item_ref.content_top, scrollTop ) //we are scrolling up ... make sure that we don't overshoot the sidebar by going over content_top. This happens when the sidebar is offseted by x number of pixels vs content\n                            ) {\n                                //console.log('sidebar_top' + cur_item_ref.sidebar_top + ' content top:' + cur_item_ref.content_top);\n                                cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_4_fixed_up';\n                            }\n                            else if (\n                                true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller( cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom, view_port_bottom ) &&\n                                true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller( cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom, cur_item_ref.content_bottom ) &&\n                                cur_item_ref.content_bottom >= view_port_bottom\n                            ) {\n                                cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_1_fixed_down';\n                            }\n                            else {\n                                cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_3_bottom_of_content';\n                            }\n                        }\n\n\n\n                        // position:fixed; bottom:0\n                        else if (\n                            true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller( cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom, view_port_bottom ) &&\n                            true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller( cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom, cur_item_ref.content_bottom ) &&\n                            'down' === scroll_direction &&\n                            cur_item_ref.content_bottom >= view_port_bottom\n                        ) {\n                            //console.log(cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom + ' < ' + cur_item_ref.content_bottom);\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_1_fixed_down';\n                        }\n\n                        // the sidebar is at the top of the content ( position:static )\n                        else if (\n                            true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal( cur_item_ref.sidebar_top, cur_item_ref.content_top ) &&\n                            'up' === scroll_direction &&\n                            cur_item_ref.content_bottom >= view_port_bottom\n                        ) {\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_2_top_of_content';\n                        }\n\n\n\n\n                        // the sidebar reached the bottom of the content\n                        else if (\n                            ( true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal(cur_item_ref.content_bottom, cur_item_ref.sidebar_bottom) && 'down' === scroll_direction ) ||\n                            cur_item_ref.content_bottom < view_port_bottom\n\n                        ) {\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_3_bottom_of_content';\n\n                        }\n                        // scrolling up, the sidebar is fixed up ( position:fixed; top:0 )\n                        else if ( true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal( scrollTop, cur_item_ref.sidebar_top ) && 'up' === scroll_direction &&\n\n                            true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal( cur_item_ref.content_top, scrollTop ) //we are scrolling up ... make sure that we don't overshoot the sidebar by going over content_top. This happens when the sidebar is offseted by x number of pixels vs content\n                        ) {\n                            //console.log('sidebar_top' + cur_item_ref.sidebar_top + ' content top:' + cur_item_ref.content_top);\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_4_fixed_up';\n                        }\n\n\n\n\n                        \n                        else if ('up' === scroll_direction && true === tdSmartSidebar._is_smaller_or_equal( view_port_bottom, cur_item_ref.sidebar_top ))\n                        {\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_2_top_of_content';\n                        }\n\n\n\n                        // when to put absolute?\n                        if (\n                            ( 'case_1_fixed_down' === cur_item_ref.sidebar_state && 'up' === scroll_direction ) ||\n                            ( 'case_4_fixed_up' === cur_item_ref.sidebar_state && 'down' === scroll_direction )\n                        ) {\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_state = 'case_5_absolute'; //absolute while going up?\n                        }\n\n                    } // end sidebar length check   cur_item_ref.sidebar_height < view_port_height\n\n\n\n\n                    \n\n                    // we have to set the content width via JS\n                    //var column_content_width = 339;\n                    //if (tdSmartSidebar.is_tablet_grid) {\n                    //    column_content_width = 251;\n                    //}\n\n\n                    var column_content_width = 0;\n\n                    var view_port_current_item = tdViewport.getCurrentIntervalItem();\n\n                    if ( null !== view_port_current_item ) {\n                        column_content_width = view_port_current_item.sidebarWidth;\n                        //tdSmartSidebar.log(\"column sidebar width : \" + column_content_width);\n                    }\n\n\n\n                    switch ( cur_item_ref.sidebar_state ) {\n                        case 'case_1_fixed_down':\n\n                            if ( true === cur_item_ref.case_1_run_once ) {\n                                break;\n                            }\n\n                            tdSmartSidebar.log( 'sidebar_id: ' + item_index + ' ' + cur_item_ref.sidebar_state );\n\n                            cur_item_ref.case_1_run_once = true;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_2_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_3_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_4_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_5_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_6_run_once = false;\n\n\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_jquery_obj.css({\n                                width: column_content_width,\n                                position: 'fixed',\n                                top: 'auto',\n                                bottom: '0',\n                                'z-index': '1'\n                            });\n\n\n                            break;\n\n                        case 'case_2_top_of_content':\n\n                            if ( true === cur_item_ref.case_2_run_once ) {\n                                break;\n                            }\n\n                            tdSmartSidebar.log( 'sidebar_id: ' + item_index + ' ' + cur_item_ref.sidebar_state );\n\n                            cur_item_ref.case_1_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_2_run_once = true;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_3_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_4_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_5_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_6_run_once = false;\n\n\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_jquery_obj.css({\n                                width: 'auto',\n                                position: 'static',\n                                top: 'auto',\n                                bottom: 'auto'\n                            });\n                            break;\n\n                        case 'case_3_bottom_of_content':\n                            // case 3 has to be recalculated if the sidebar height changes\n\n                            if ( true === cur_item_ref.case_3_run_once &&\n                                cur_item_ref.case_3_last_sidebar_height === cur_item_ref.sidebar_height &&\n                                cur_item_ref.case_3_last_content_height === cur_item_ref.content_height\n                            ) { //if the case already runned AND the sidebar height did not change\n                                break;\n                            }\n\n                            tdSmartSidebar.log( 'sidebar_id: ' + item_index + ' ' + cur_item_ref.sidebar_state );\n\n                            cur_item_ref.case_1_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_2_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_3_run_once = true;\n     cur_item_ref.sidebar_jquery_obj.css({\n                                width: column_content_width,\n                                position: 'absolute',\n                                top: cur_item_ref.content_bottom - cur_item_ref.sidebar_height - cur_item_ref.content_top,\n                                bottom: 'auto'\n                            });\n                            break;\n\n                        case 'case_4_fixed_up':\n\n                            if ( true === cur_item_ref.case_4_run_once && cur_item_ref.case_4_last_menu_offset === td_affix_menu_computed_height ) { //if the case already runned AND the menu height did not changed\n                                break;\n                            }\n\n                            tdSmartSidebar.log( 'sidebar_id: ' + item_index + ' ' + cur_item_ref.sidebar_state );\n\n                            cur_item_ref.case_1_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_2_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_3_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_4_run_once = true;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_4_last_menu_offset = td_affix_menu_computed_height;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_5_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_6_run_once = false;\n\n\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_jquery_obj.css({\n                                width: column_content_width,\n                                position: 'fixed',\n                                top: td_affix_menu_computed_height,\n                                bottom: 'auto'\n                            });\n                            break;\n\n                        case 'case_5_absolute':\n\n                            if ( true === cur_item_ref.case_5_run_once ) {\n                                break;\n                            }\n\n                            tdSmartSidebar.log( 'sidebar_id: ' + item_index + ' ' + cur_item_ref.sidebar_state );\n\n                            cur_item_ref.case_1_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_2_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_3_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_4_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_5_run_once = true;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_6_run_once = false;\n\n\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_jquery_obj.css({\n                                width: column_content_width,\n                                position: 'absolute',\n                                top: cur_item_ref.sidebar_top - cur_item_ref.content_top,\n                                bottom: 'auto'\n                            });\n                            break;\n\n                        case 'case_6_content_too_small':\n\n                            if ( true === cur_item_ref.case_6_run_once ) {\n                                break;\n                            }\n\n                            tdSmartSidebar.log( 'sidebar_id: ' + item_index + ' ' + cur_item_ref.case_3_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_4_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_5_run_once = false;\n                            cur_item_ref.case_6_run_once = true;\n\n                            cur_item_ref.sidebar_jquery_obj.css({\n                                width: 'auto',\n                                position: 'static',\n                                top: 'auto',\n                                bottom: 'auto'\n                            });\n                            break;\n                    }\n                } // end for loop\n            }); // end request animation frame\n        }, // end td_events_scroll\n\n\n        compute: function() {\n\n            tdSmartSidebar.td_events_scroll( jQuery( window ).scrollTop() );\n        },\n\n\n        // resets the run once flags. It may fail sometimes due to case_3_last_sidebar_height & case_4_last_menu_offset\n        reset_run_once_flags: function () {\n            for ( var item_index = 0; item_index < tdSmartSidebar.items.length; item_index++ ) {\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_1_run_once = false;\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_2_run_once = false;\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_3_run_once = false;\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_3_last_sidebar_height = 0;\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_3_last_content_height = 0;\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_4_run_once = false;\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_4_last_menu_offset = 0;\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_5_run_once = false;\n                tdSmartSidebar.items[ item_index ].case_6_run_once = false;\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n        td_events_resize: function() {\n            // enable and disable the smart sidebar\n\n            tdSmartSidebar._view_port_current_interval_index = tdViewport.getCurrentIntervalIndex();\n\n            switch ( tdSmartSidebar._view_port_current_interval_index ) {\n\n                case 0 :\n\n                    tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled = false;\n\n                    // flag marked false to be made true only once, when the view port has not the first interval index [0]\n                    tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled_state_run_once = false;\n\n                    break;\n\n                case 1 :\n                    if ( false === tdSmartSidebar.is_tablet_grid ) { // we switched\n\n                        tdSmartSidebar.reset_run_once_flags();\n\n                        tdSmartSidebar.is_tablet_grid = true;\n                        tdSmartSidebar.is_desktop_grid = false;\n\n                        tdSmartSidebar.log( 'view port tablet' );\n                    }\n                    tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled = true;\n                    tdSmartSidebar.is_disabled_state_run_once = false;\n\n                    if ( false === tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled_state_run_once ) {\n                        tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled_state_run_once = true;\n                        tdSmartSidebar.log( 'smart_sidebar_enabled' );\n                    }\n                    break;\n\n                case 2 :\n                case 3 :\n                    if ( true === tdSmartSidebar.is_tablet_grid ) { // we switched\n\n                        tdSmartSidebar.reset_run_once_flags();\n\n                        tdSmartSidebar.is_tablet_grid = false;\n                        tdSmartSidebar.is_desktop_grid = true;\n\n                        tdSmartSidebar.log( 'view port desktop' );\n                    }\n                    tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled = true;\n                    tdSmartSidebar.is_disabled_state_run_once = false;\n\n                    if ( false === tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled_state_run_once ) {\n                        tdSmartSidebar.is_enabled_state_run_once = true;\n                        tdSmartSidebar.log( 'smart_sidebar_enabled' );\n                    }\n                    break;\n            }\n\n            // @todo we may be able to delay the compute a bit (aka run it on the 500ms timer)\n            tdSmartSidebar.compute();\n        },\n\n\n        log: function( msg ) {\n            //console.log(msg);\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _is_smaller_or_equal: function( number1, number2 ) {\n            // check if the two numbers are approximately equal\n            // - first we check if the difference between the numbers is bigger than 1 unit\n            // - second we check if the first number is bigger than the second one\n            // if the two conditions are met, we return false\n\n\n            if ( Math.abs( number1 - number2 ) >= 1) {\n                // we have a difference that is bigger than 1 unit (px), check if the numbers are smaller or bigger\n                if ( number1 < number2 ) {\n                    return true;\n                } else {\n                    return false;\n                }\n            } else {\n                // the difference between the two numbers is smaller than one unit (1 px), this means that the two numbers are the same\n                return true;\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _is_smaller: function( number1, number2 ) {\n            if ( Math.abs( number1 - number2 ) >= 1) {\n                if ( number1 < number2 ) {\n                    return true;\n                } else {\n                    return false;\n                }\n            } else {\n                // the difference between the two numbers is smaller than one unit (1 px), this means that the two numbers are the same\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n    };\n\n    //console.log(tdSmartSidebar.items);\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdInfiniteLoader = {};\n\n(function () {\n    \"use strict\";\n\n    \n\n\n    tdInfiniteLoader = {\n\n        hasItems: false, // this class will only work when this flag is true. If we don't have any items, all the calculations on scroll will be disabled by this flag\n\n        items: [], //the array that has all the items\n\n        // one item object (instantiable)\n        item: function() {\n            this.uid=''; // - an unique id of the item, usually is the block id! - it is used to enable the callback on a per item basis\n            this.jqueryObj = ''; //find the item easily for animation ??\n            this.bottomTop = 0;  //distance from the bottom of the dom element to top - computed in - @see tdInfiniteLoader.compute_top_distances();\n            this.isVisibleCallbackEnabled = true; //the callback will fire only when this flag is true. We set it to true after the blocks ajax run @see tdBlocks.tdBlockAjaxLoadingEnd\n            this.isVisibleCallback = function () { //callback when the item's bottom is visible :)\n            };\n        },\n\n        addItem: function(item) {\n            tdInfiniteLoader.hasItems = true; //put the flag that we have items\n            tdInfiniteLoader.items.push(item);\n        },\n\n\n        \n        computeTopDistances: function() {\n\n            //check the flag to see if we have any items\n            if ( tdInfiniteLoader.hasItems === false ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            jQuery.each(tdInfiniteLoader.items, function(index, v_event) {\n                var topTop = tdInfiniteLoader.items[index].jqueryObj.offset().top;\n                //top of document to bottom of element\n                tdInfiniteLoader.items[index].bottomTop = topTop + tdInfiniteLoader.items[index].jqueryObj.height();\n            });\n\n            //also calculate the events\n            tdInfiniteLoader.computeEvents();\n\n        },\n\n\n        \n        computeEvents: function() {\n            //check the flag to see if we have any items\n            if ( tdInfiniteLoader.hasItems === false ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            var topToViewportBottom = jQuery(window).height() + jQuery(window).scrollTop();\n\n\n            jQuery.each(tdInfiniteLoader.items, function(index, item) {\n                if ( tdInfiniteLoader.items[index].bottomTop < topToViewportBottom + 700 ) {\n\n                    //check to see if we can call the callback again\n                    if ( tdInfiniteLoader.items[index].isVisibleCallbackEnabled === true ) {\n                        tdInfiniteLoader.items[index].isVisibleCallbackEnabled = false;\n                        //the call\n                        tdInfiniteLoader.items[index].isVisibleCallback();\n                    }\n                }\n\n\n            });\n        },\n\n\n        \n        enable_is_visible_callback: function($item_uid) {\n            jQuery.each(tdInfiniteLoader.items, function(index, item) {\n                if ( item.uid === $item_uid ) {\n                    tdInfiniteLoader.items[index].isVisibleCallbackEnabled = true;\n                    return false; //brake jquery each\n                }\n            });\n        }\n\n    };\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    \n    jQuery('.td_ajax_infinite').each( function() {\n\n        // create a new infinite loader item\n        var tdInfiniteLoaderItem = new tdInfiniteLoader.item();\n\n        tdInfiniteLoaderItem.jqueryObj = jQuery(this);\n        tdInfiniteLoaderItem.uid = jQuery(this).data('td_block_id');\n\n\n        \n        tdInfiniteLoaderItem.isVisibleCallback = function () {      // the is_visible callback is called when we have to pull new content up because the element is visible\n\n            // get the current block object\n            var currentBlockObj = tdBlocks.tdGetBlockObjById(tdInfiniteLoaderItem.jqueryObj.data('td_block_id'));\n\n            // if we don't have a infinite stop limit or if we have one we dint' hit it yet\n            if ( currentBlockObj.ajax_pagination_infinite_stop === '' ||\n                    currentBlockObj.td_current_page < (parseInt(currentBlockObj.ajax_pagination_infinite_stop) + 1) ) {\n\n                // get the block data and increment the pagination\n                currentBlockObj.td_current_page++;\n                tdBlocks.tdAjaxDoBlockRequest(currentBlockObj, 'infinite_load');\n\n            } else {\n                \n                if ( currentBlockObj.td_current_page < currentBlockObj.max_num_pages ) {\n                    setTimeout( function(){\n                        jQuery('#infinite-lm-' + currentBlockObj.id)\n                            .css('display', 'block')\n                            .css('visibility', 'visible')\n                        ;\n                    }, 400);\n                }\n            }\n        };\n        tdInfiniteLoader.addItem(tdInfiniteLoaderItem);\n    });\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n    //compute to\n    jQuery(window).load( function() {\n        tdInfiniteLoader.computeTopDistances();\n    });\n\n    jQuery().ready( function() {\n        tdInfiniteLoader.computeTopDistances();\n    });\n})();\n\n\n\"use strict\";\n\nvar Froogaloop=function(){function e(a){return new e.fn.init(a)}function };\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdEvents = {};\n\n(function(){\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdEvents = {\n\n        //the events - we have timers that look at the variables and fire the event if the flag is true\n        scroll_event_slow_run: false,\n        scroll_event_medium_run: false,\n\n        resize_event_slow_run: false, //when true, fire up the resize event\n        resize_event_medium_run: false,\n\n\n        scroll_window_scrollTop: 0, //used to store the scrollTop\n\n        window_pageYOffset: window.pageYOffset, // @todo see if it can replace scroll_window_scrollTop [used by others]\n        window_innerHeight: window.innerHeight, // used to store the window height\n        window_innerWidth: window.innerWidth, // used to store the window width\n\n        init: function() {\n\n            jQuery( window ).scroll(function() {\n                tdEvents.scroll_event_slow_run = true;\n                tdEvents.scroll_event_medium_run = true;\n\n                //read the scroll top\n                tdEvents.scroll_window_scrollTop = jQuery( window ).scrollTop();\n                tdEvents.window_pageYOffset = window.pageYOffset;\n\n                \n\n                tdAffix.td_events_scroll( tdEvents.scroll_window_scrollTop ); //main menu\n\n                tdSmartSidebar.td_events_scroll( tdEvents.scroll_window_scrollTop ); //smart sidebar scroll\n\n\n                // call real tdCustomEvents scroll\n                tdCustomEvents._callback_scroll();\n            });\n\n\n            jQuery( window ).resize(function() {\n                tdEvents.resize_event_slow_run = true;\n                tdEvents.resize_event_medium_run = true;\n\n                tdEvents.window_innerHeight = window.innerHeight;\n                tdEvents.window_innerWidth = window.innerWidth;\n\n                //var w = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientWidth, window.innerWidth || 0);\n\n                //w = jQuery(document).width();\n                //console.log(w);\n\n\n                // call real tdCustomEvents resize\n                tdCustomEvents._callback_resize();\n            });\n\n\n\n            //medium resolution timer for rest?\n            setInterval(function() {\n\n                // it must run before any others\n                tdViewport.detectChanges();\n\n                //scroll event\n                if ( tdEvents.scroll_event_medium_run ) {\n                    tdEvents.scroll_event_medium_run = false;\n                    //compute events for the infinite scroll\n                    tdInfiniteLoader.computeEvents();\n\n\n                    // call lazy tdCustomEvents scroll\n                    tdCustomEvents._lazy_callback_scroll_100();\n                }\n\n                if ( tdEvents.resize_event_medium_run ) {\n                    tdEvents.resize_event_medium_run = false;\n                    tdSmartSidebar.td_events_resize();\n\n\n                    // call lazy tdCustomEvents resize\n                    tdCustomEvents._lazy_callback_resize_100();\n                }\n            }, 100);\n\n\n\n            //low resolution timer for rest?\n            setInterval(function() {\n                //scroll event\n                if ( tdEvents.scroll_event_slow_run ) {\n                    tdEvents.scroll_event_slow_run = false;\n\n                    //back to top\n                    td_events_scroll_scroll_to_top( tdEvents.scroll_window_scrollTop );\n\n                    //more articles box\n                    td_more_articles_box.td_events_scroll( tdEvents.scroll_window_scrollTop );\n\n\n                    // call lazy tdCustomEvents scroll\n                    tdCustomEvents._lazy_callback_scroll_500();\n                }\n\n                //resize event\n                if ( tdEvents.resize_event_slow_run ) {\n                    tdEvents.resize_event_slow_run = false;\n                    tdAffix.compute_wrapper();\n                    tdAffix.compute_top();\n                    tdDetect.runIsPhoneScreen();\n\n\n                    // call lazy tdCustomEvents resize\n                    tdCustomEvents._lazy_callback_resize_500();\n                }\n            }, 500);\n        }\n    };\n\n    tdEvents.init();\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdAjaxCount = {};\n\n(function(){\n\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdAjaxCount = {\n\n        //td_get_views_counts_ajax : function( page_type, array_ids ) {\n        tdGetViewsCountsAjax : function( postType, arrayIds ) {\n\n            //what function to call based on postType\n            var pageTypeAction = 'td_ajax_get_views';//postType = page\n            if ( 'post' === postType ) {\n                pageTypeAction = 'td_ajax_update_views';\n            }\n\n            jQuery.ajax({\n                type: 'POST',\n                url: td_ajax_url,\n                cache: true,\n                data: {\n                    action: pageTypeAction,\n                    td_post_ids: arrayIds\n                },\n                success: function( data, textStatus, XMLHttpRequest ) {\n                    var tdAjaxPostCounts = jQuery.parseJSON( data );//get the return dara\n\n                    //check the return var to be object\n                    if ( tdAjaxPostCounts instanceof Object ) {\n                        //alert('value is Object!');\n\n                        //iterate throw the object\n                        jQuery.each( tdAjaxPostCounts, function( idPost, value ) {\n                            //alert(id_post + \": \" + value);\n\n                            //this is the count placeholder in witch we write the post count\n                            var currentPostCount = '.td-nr-views-' + idPost;\n\n                            jQuery( currentPostCount ).html( value );\n                    //console.log(errorThrown);\n                }\n            });\n        }\n    };\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdYoutubePlayers = {};\nvar tdVimeoPlayers = {};\n\n// @todo this ready hook function must be moved from here\njQuery().ready(function() {\n\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdYoutubePlayers.init();\n    tdVimeoPlayers.init();\n});\n\n\n\n(function() {\n\n    'use strict';\n\n\n    // the youtube list players (the init() method should be called before using the list)\n    tdYoutubePlayers = {\n\n        // the part name of the player id (they will be ex playerId ) {\n\n                    var youtubePlayer = tdYoutubePlayers.players[ i ];\n\n                    // This status is necessary just for mobile\n                    youtubePlayer.playStatus();\n\n                    if ( 'play' === option ) {\n\n                        youtubePlayer.autoplay = 1;\n\n                        if ( undefined === videoId ) {\n                            youtubePlayer.playerPlay();\n                        } else {\n                            youtubePlayer.playVideo(videoId);\n                        }\n                    } else                         //alert(textStatus);\n                        });\n                    } else {\n                        youtubePlayer.loadPlayer( videoId );\n                    }\n                },\n\n\n                loadPlayer: function (videoId) {\n\n                    var videoIdToPlay = youtubePlayer._videoId;\n\n                    if ( undefined !== videoId ) {\n                        videoIdToPlay = videoId;\n                    }\n\n                    if ( undefined === videoIdToPlay ) {\n                        return;\n                    }\n\n                   height: '100%',\n                        width: '100%',\n                        videoId: videoIdToPlay,\n                        events: {\n                            'onStateChange': youtubePlayer.onPlayerStateChange\n                        }\n                    });\n                },\n\n\n                onPlayerStateChange: function (event) {\n                    if (event.data === YT.PlayerState.PLAYING) {\n\n                        //add pause to playlist control\n                        youtubePlayer.pauseStatus();\n\n                    } else if (event.data === YT.PlayerState.ENDED) {\n\n                        youtubePlayer.playStatus();\n\n                        //if a video has ended then make auto play = 1; This is the case when the user set autoplay = 0 but start watching videos\n                        youtubePlayer.autoplay = 1;\n\n\n                        //get the next video\n                        var nextVideoId = '',\n                            tdVideoCurrentlyPlaying = youtubePlayer.jqTDWrapperVideoPlaylist.find( '.td_video_currently_playing' );\n\n                        if ( tdVideoCurrentlyPlaying.length ) {\n // the vimeo list players (to use it, the init() method should be called)\n    // !Important.         }\n            }\n\n            if ( '1' == jqPlayerWrapper.data( 'autoplay' ) ) {\n                vimeoPlayer.autoplay = 1;\n            }\n\n            var firstVideo = playerId, option, videoId ) {\n            for ( var i = 0; i < tdVimeoPlayers.players.length; i++ ) {\n\n                if ( tdVimeoPlayers.players[ i ].playerId == playerId ) {\n\n                    var vimeoPlayer = tdVimeoPlayers.players[ i ];\n\n                    if ( 'play' === option ) {\n\n                        vimeoPlayer.autoplay = 1;\n\n                        if ( undefined !== tdVimeoPlayers.existingAutoplay = false;\n\n                            vimeoPlayer.createPlayer( videoId );\n                        } else {\n                            vimeoPlayer.playerPlay();\n                        }\n\n                    } else if ( 'pause' === option ) {\n                        vimeoPlayer.playerPause();\n                    }\n\n                    break;\n vimeoPlayer.playStatus();\n                            } else {\n                                vimeoPlayer.pauseStatus();\n                            }\n                        } else {\n                            vimeoPlayer.playStatus();\n                        }\n                        vimeoPlayer.jqPlayerWrapper.html( '<iframe id=\"' + vimeoPlayer.playerId + '\" src=\"https://player.vimeo.com/video/' + videoId + '?api=1&player_id=' + vimeoPlayer.playerId + '' + autoplay + '\"  frameborder=\"0\" webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen allowfullscreen></iframe>' );\n                        vimeoPlayer.createVimeoObjectPlayer( jQuery );\n                    }\n                },\n\n                createVimeoObjectPlayer : function( $ ) {\n                    var player = '',\n                        iframe = $( '#' + vimeoPlayer.playerId );\n\n                    if ( iframe.length ) {\n                        player = $f( iframe[0] );\n\n                        //a copy of the vimeo player : needed when playing or pausing the vimeo pleyer from the playlist control\n                        vimeoPlayer.player = player;\n\n                        // When the player is ready, add listeners for pause, finish, and playProgress\n                        player.addEvent( 'ready', function() {\n\n                            player.addEvent( 'play', function( data ) {\n                                vimeoPlayer.pauseStatus();\n                                vimeoPlayer.autoplay = 1;\n                            });\n\n                            player.addEvent( 'pause', function( data ) {\n                                vimeoPlayer.playStatus();\n                            });\n\n                            player.addEvent( 'finish', function( data ) {\n\n                                var nextVideoId = '',\n                                    tdVideoCurrentlyPlaying = vimeoPlayer.jqTDWrapperVideoPlaylist.find( '.td_video_currently_playing' );\n\n                                if ( tdVideoCurrentlyPlaying.length ) {\n                                    var jQuery( nextSibling ).data( 'video-id' );\n                                    }\n                                }\n\n                                if ( '' !== nextVideoId ) {\n                                    vimeoPlayer.createPlayer( nextVideoId );\n\n                                    if ( tdDetect.isMobileDevice ) {\n                                        vimeoPlayer.playStatus();\n                                    } else {\n                                        vimeoPlayer.pauseStatus();\n                                    }\n                                } else {\n                                    vimeoPlayer.playStatus();\n                                }\n                            });\n                        });\n                    }\n                },\n\n                // play the current video\n                playerPlay: function () {\n                    vimeoPlayer.autoplay = 1;\n                    vimeoPlayer.player.api( 'play' );\n                },\n\n                // pause the current video\n                playerPause: function () {\n                    vimeoPlayer.player.api( 'pause' );\n                },\n\n                // change status to 'play'\n                playStatus: function() {\n                    vimeoPlayer.jqControlPlayer.removeClass( 'td-sp-video-pause' ).addClass( 'td-sp-video-play' );\n                },\n\n );\n                }\n            };\n\n            return vimeoPlayer;\n        }\n    };\n\n})();\n\n\n\"use strict\";\n\n//call function to resize the smartlist on ready (for safary)\njQuery(window).load(function() {\n    td_resize_smartlist_sliders_and_update();\n});\n\n//call function to resize the smartlist on ready\njQuery().ready(function() {\n    td_resize_smartlist_sliders_and_update();\n});\n\n\n\n//function to resize the height of the smartlist slide\nfunction td_resize_smartlist_slides(args) {\n    var slide_displayd = args.currentSlideNumber;\n\n\n    //console.log(args.sliderObject[0]);\n    //console.log(args.data.obj[0]);\n\n    var current_slider = jQuery(args.data.obj[0]).attr(\"id\");\n\n    if(!tdDetect.isIe8) {\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider).css(\"overflow\", \"none\");\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \" .td-item\").css(\"overflow\", \"visible\");\n    }\n\n    var setHeight = 0;\n    setHeight = jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \"_item_\" + slide_displayd).outerHeight(true);\n\n\n    jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \", #\" + current_slider + \" .td-slider\").css({\n        height: setHeight\n    });\n}\n\n\n\n\n\n//function to resize and update the height of the smartlist slide\nfunction td_resize_smartlist_sliders_and_update() {\n    jQuery(document).find('.td-smart-list-slider').each(function() {\n        var current_slider = jQuery(this).attr(\"id\");\n\n        if(!tdDetect.isIe8) {\n            jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider).css(\"overflow\", \"none\");\n            jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \" .td-item\").css(\"overflow\", \"visible\");\n        }\n\n        var setHeight = 0;\n        setHeight = jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \"_item_\" + td_history.get_current_page(\"slide\")).outerHeight(true);\n\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \", #\" + current_slider + \" .td-slider\").css({\n            height: setHeight\n        });\n\n        if(tdDetect.isAndroid) {\n            setTimeout(function () {\n                jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider).iosSlider(\"update\");\n            }, 2000);\n        }\n    });\n}\n\n\n//function to resize the height of the normal slide\nfunction td_resize_normal_slide(args) {\n    var slide_displayd = 0;//args.currentSlideNumber;\n\n    var current_slider = jQuery(args.data.obj[0]).attr(\"id\");\n\n    //get window width\n    var window_wight = td_get_document_width();\n\n    if (!tdDetect.isIe8) {\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider).css(\"overflow\", \"none\");\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \" .td-item\").css(\"overflow\", \"visible\");\n    }\n\n    var setHeight = 0;\n    var slide_outer_width = jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \"_item_\" + slide_displayd).outerWidth(true);\n\n    //only for android, width of the screen to start changing the height of the slide\n    var max_wight_resize = 780;\n    if(tdDetect.isAndroid) {\n        max_wight_resize = 1000;\n    }\n\n    if (window_wight < max_wight_resize && !tdDetect.isIpad) {//problem because we cannot get an accurate page width\n        if(slide_outer_width > 300) {\n            setHeight = slide_outer_width * 0.5;\n        } else {\n            setHeight = slide_outer_width;\n        }\n\n        //console.log(window_wight);\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \", #\" + current_slider + \" .td-slider, #\" + current_slider + \" .td-slider .td-module-thumb\").css({\n            height: setHeight\n        });\n    }\n\n}\n\n\n\n//function to resize and update the height of the slide for normal sliders\nfunction td_resize_normal_slide_and_update(args) {\n\n\n    //console.log('resize 2');\n    var slide_displayd = 0;//args.currentSlideNumber;\n\n    var current_slider = jQuery(args.data.obj[0]).attr(\"id\");\n\n    //get window width\n    var window_wight = td_get_document_width();\n\n    if(!tdDetect.isIe8) {\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider).css(\"overflow\", \"none\");\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \" .td-item\").css(\"overflow\", \"visible\");\n    }\n\n    var setHeight = 0;\n    var slide_outer_width = jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \"_item_\" + slide_displayd).outerWidth(true);\n\n    //only for android, width of the screen to start changing the height of the slide\n    var max_wight_resize = 780;\n    if(tdDetect.isAndroid) {\n        max_wight_resize = 1000;\n    }\n\n    if (window_wight < max_wight_resize && !tdDetect.isIpad) {//problem because we cannot get an accurate page width\n        if(slide_outer_width > 300) {\n            setHeight = slide_outer_width * 0.5;\n        } else {\n            setHeight = slide_outer_width;\n        }\n\n        //console.log(window_wight);\n        jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider + \", #\" + current_slider + \" .td-slider, #\" + current_slider + \" .td-slider .td-module-thumb\").css({\n            height: setHeight\n        });\n\n        setTimeout(function () {\n            jQuery(\"#\" + current_slider).iosSlider(\"update\");\n\n\n\n        }, 2000);\n\n    }\n}\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdPullDown = {};\n\n( function(){\n\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdPullDown = {\n\n\n        // - keeps internally the current interval index\n        // - it's set at init()\n        _view_port_interval_index : tdViewport.INTERVAL_INITIAL_INDEX,\n\n\n\n        // this flag mark that the tdPullDown.items must be reinitialized at the changing view port size\n        reinitialize_items_at_change_view_port: false,\n\n\n\n        // - the list of items\n        items: [],\n\n\n\n        // - the item represents a pair of lists (a horizontal and a vertical one)\n        // - to be initialized, every property with 'IT MUST BE SPECIFIED' is mandatory\n        item: function item() {\n\n\n            // OPTIONAL - here we store the block Unique ID. This enables us to delete the item via this id @see tdPullDown.deleteItem\n            this.blockUid = '';\n\n            // - the jquery object of the horizontal list.\n            // IT MUST BE SPECIFIED.\n            this.horizontal_jquery_obj = '';\n\n            // - the jquery object of the vertical list.\n            // IT MUST BE SPECIFIED\n            this.vertical_jquery_obj = '';\n\n            // - the jquery container object.\n            // - it contains the horizontal and the vertical jquery objects\n            // IT MUST BE SPECIFIED.\n            this.container_jquery_obj = '';\n\n            // - the css class of an horizontal element.\n            // IT MUST BE SPECIFIED\n            this.horizontal_element_css_class = '';\n\n\n\n            // the minimum no. of elements to be shown by the horizontal list\n            // - IT CAN BE SPECIFIED\n            this.minimum_elements = 2;\n\n\n\n            // - the array of jquery elements whose widths must be excluded from the width of the container object\n            // IT CAN BE SPECIFIED\n            this.excluded_jquery_elements = [];\n\n            // - the extra space of the horizontal jquery object occupied by the excluded jquery elements\n            // - it's not initialized with 0 because widths of the elements can not be integer values\n            // - now, it's set to 1px\n            this._horizontal_extra_space = 1;\n\n\n\n            // - the array of objects from the horizontal list\n            this._horizontal_elements = [];\n\n            // - the array of objects from the vertical list\n            this._vertical_elements = [];\n\n\n\n            // - the jquery object of the first ul container in the vertical list\n            // - it is calculated as the first 'ul' of the vertical jquery object\n            this._vertical_ul_jquery_obj = '';\n\n\n\n            // - the outer width of the vertical top header (ex.'More')\n            // - it's used to calculate if the last vertical element has enough space in the horizontal list,\n            // without considering the vertical top header width\n            this._vertical_jquery_obj_outer_width = 0;\n\n\n\n            // flag used to mark the initialization item\n            this._is_initialized = false;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        init: function() {\n\n            tdPullDown._view_port_interval_index = tdViewport.getCurrentIntervalIndex();\n\n            tdPullDown.items = [];\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        add_item: function( item ) {\n\n            // check to see if the item is ok\n            if (item.vertical_jquery_obj.length !== 1) {\n                throw 'item.vertical_jquery_obj is more or less than one!';\n            }\n            if (item.horizontal_jquery_obj.length !== 1) {\n                throw 'item.horizontal_jquery_obj is more or less than one!';\n            }\n            if (item.container_jquery_obj.length !== 1) {\n                throw 'item.container_jquery_obj is more or less than one!';\n            }\n            if (item.horizontal_element_css_class === '') {\n                throw 'item.horizontal_element_css_class is empty';\n            }\n\n            // the item is added in the item list\n            tdPullDown.items.push( item );\n\n            // the item is initialized only once when it is added\n            tdPullDown._initialize_item( item );\n\n            //  the item is ready to be computed\n            tdPullDown._compute_item( item );\n        },\n\n\n        \n        deleteItem: function(blockUid) {\n            for (var cnt = 0; cnt < tdPullDown.items.length; cnt++) {\n                if (tdPullDown.items[cnt].blockUid === blockUid) {\n                    tdPullDown.items.splice(cnt, 1); // remove the item from the \"array\"\n                    return true;\n                }\n            }\n            return false;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _initialize_item: function( item ) {\n\n            // an item must be initialized only once\n            if ( true === item._is_initialized ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            //// the mandatory item properties are verified\n            // @20/4/2016 - i've moved all the checks to add_item -ra\n            //if ( ( '' === item.horizontal_jquery_obj ) ||\n            //    ( '' === item.vertical_jquery_obj ) ||\n            //    ( '' === item.container_jquery_obj ) ||\n            //    ( '' === item.horizontal_element_css_class ) ) {\n            //\n            //    tdPullDown.log( 'Item can\\' be initialized. It doesn\\'t have all the mandatory properties' );\n            //    return;\n            //}\n\n\n            // the jquery object of the first ul container in the vertical list is initialized\n            item._vertical_ul_jquery_obj = item.vertical_jquery_obj.find( 'ul:first' );\n\n            if ( 0 === item._vertical_ul_jquery_obj.length ) {\n\n                tdPullDown.log( 'Item can\\' be initialized. The vertical list doesn\\'t have an \\'ul\\' container' );\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            // the elements of the horizontal jquery object, having a specified css class\n            var elements = item.horizontal_jquery_obj.find( '.' + item.horizontal_element_css_class );\n\n            var local_jquery_element = null;\n            var local_object = null;\n\n            // for each element an object is added in the horizontal list\n            elements.each( function ( index, element ) {\n\n                local_jquery_element = jQuery( element );\n\n                // @todo here we need a css class\n                local_jquery_element.css( '-webkit-transition', 'opacity 0.2s' );\n                local_jquery_element.css( '-moz-transition', 'opacity 0.2s' );\n                local_jquery_element.css( '-o-transition', 'opacity 0.2s' );\n                local_jquery_element.css( 'transition', 'opacity 0.2s' );\n\n                local_jquery_element.css( 'opacity', '1' );\n\n\n                // the cached object used to keep the jquery object and its outerWidth\n                local_object = {\n\n                    // the jquery element\n                    jquery_object: local_jquery_element,\n\n                    // the outer width including border\n                    calculated_width: local_jquery_element.outerWidth( true )\n                };\n\n                // the horizontal list is populated\n                item._horizontal_elements.push( local_object );\n            });\n\n\n            // the outer width of the vertical top header (ex.'More') is initialized\n            item._vertical_jquery_obj_outer_width = item.vertical_jquery_obj.outerWidth( true );\n\n\n            // by default, the vertical jquery object is hidden, being shown when at least one element is moved in it\n            item.vertical_jquery_obj.css( 'display', 'none' );\n\n\n\n            // the the extra space occupied by the horizontal jquery object is calculated\n\n            var horizontal_jquery_obj_padding_left = item.horizontal_jquery_obj.css( 'padding-left' );\n            if ( ( undefined !== horizontal_jquery_obj_padding_left ) && ( '' !== horizontal_jquery_obj_padding_left ) ) {\n                item._horizontal_extra_space += parseInt( horizontal_jquery_obj_padding_left.replace( 'px', '' ) );\n            }\n\n            var horizontal_jquery_obj_padding_right = item.horizontal_jquery_obj.css( 'padding-right' );\n            if ( ( undefined !== horizontal_jquery_obj_padding_right ) && ( '' !== horizontal_jquery_obj_padding_right ) ) {\n                item._horizontal_extra_space += parseInt( horizontal_jquery_obj_padding_right.replace( 'px', '' ) );\n            }\n\n\n            var horizontal_jquery_obj_margin_left = item.horizontal_jquery_obj.css( 'margin-left' );\n            if ( ( undefined !== horizontal_jquery_obj_margin_left ) && ( '' !== horizontal_jquery_obj_margin_left ) ) {\n                item._horizontal_extra_space += parseInt( horizontal_jquery_obj_margin_left.replace( 'px', '' ) );\n            }\n\n            var horizontal_jquery_obj_margin_right = item.horizontal_jquery_obj.css( 'margin-right' );\n            if ( ( undefined !== horizontal_jquery_obj_margin_right ) && ( '' !== horizontal_jquery_obj_margin_right ) ) {\n                item._horizontal_extra_space += parseInt( horizontal_jquery_obj_margin_right.replace( 'px', '' ) );\n            }\n\n\n            var horizontal_jquery_obj_border_left = item.horizontal_jquery_obj.css( 'border-left' );\n            if ( ( undefined !== horizontal_jquery_obj_border_left ) && ( '' !== horizontal_jquery_obj_border_left ) ) {\n                item._horizontal_extra_space += parseInt( horizontal_jquery_obj_border_left.replace( 'px', '' ) );\n            }\n\n            var horizontal_jquery_obj_border_right = item.horizontal_jquery_obj.css( 'border-right' );\n            if ( ( undefined !== horizontal_jquery_obj_border_right ) && ( '' !== horizontal_jquery_obj_border_right ) ) {\n                item._horizontal_extra_space += parseInt( horizontal_jquery_obj_border_right.replace( 'px', '' ) );\n            }\n\n\n            // the item is marked as initialized, being ready to be computed\n            item._is_initialized = true;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _get_horizontal_elements_width: function( item ) {\n\n            var sum_width = 0;\n\n            for ( var i = item._horizontal_elements.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {\n                sum_width += item._horizontal_elements[ i ].calculated_width;\n            }\n            return sum_width;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _reinitialize_all_items: function() {\n\n            for ( var i = tdPullDown.items.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {\n                tdPullDown._reinitialize_item( tdPullDown.items[ i ] );\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _reinitialize_item: function( item ) {\n\n            // a not initialized item can't be reinitialized\n            if ( false === item._is_initialized ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            //  the flag is marked, so any further operation on this item is stopped\n            item._is_initialized = false;\n\n            // the html elements of the vertical list are all moved into the horizontal jquery object\n            item.horizontal_jquery_obj.html( item.horizontal_jquery_obj.html() + item._vertical_ul_jquery_obj.html() );\n\n            // the html content of the vertical list is cleared\n            item._vertical_ul_jquery_obj.html( '' );\n\n            // the horizontal list is empty initialized\n            item._horizontal_elements = [];\n\n            // the vertical list is empty initialized\n            item._vertical_elements = [];\n\n            // the extra space is initialized\n            item._horizontal_extra_space = 1;\n\n            // the item is ready to be initialized again\n            tdPullDown._initialize_item( item );\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _compute_item: function( item ) {\n\n            // the item must be initialized first\n            if ( false === item._is_initialized ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n\n            // the horizontal header margin is set 0 and the horizontal space is computing without its margin\n            // @see tdPullDown._prepare_horizontal_header\n            tdPullDown._prepare_horizontal_header( item, true );\n\n\n\n            // - the space where horizontal elements lie\n            // - it is the container width minus any extra horizontal space\n            var space_for_horizontal_elements = 0;\n\n            // the object container width\n            var container_jquery_width = item.container_jquery_obj.css( 'width' );\n\n            if ( ( undefined !== container_jquery_width ) && ( '' !== container_jquery_width ) ) {\n\n                // the space for new horizontal elements is initialized by the container width\n                space_for_horizontal_elements = container_jquery_width.replace( 'px', '' );\n\n                // then this space is reduced by the widths of the excluded elements\n                for ( var i = item.excluded_jquery_elements.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {\n                    space_for_horizontal_elements -= item.excluded_jquery_elements[ i ].contents().outerWidth( true );\n                }\n            }\n\n\n            // if the vertical list is empty, the space for horizontal elements does not contain the width of the vertical head list\n            if ( item._vertical_elements.length >
