0 ) {\n                space_for_horizontal_elements -= item._vertical_jquery_obj_outer_width;\n            }\n\n            // the space occupied by the horizontal elements is removed\n            space_for_horizontal_elements -= tdPullDown._get_horizontal_elements_width( item );\n\n            // the horizontal extra space is used to add an extra gap when the width of one element or a js math computation does a not integer value\n            space_for_horizontal_elements -= item._horizontal_extra_space;\n\n\n            // the current element being moved between the lists\n            var local_current_element;\n\n\n            // if there's not enough space for the horizontal elements, then the last of them are moved to the vertical list\n            while ( space_for_horizontal_elements < 0 ) {\n\n                // if there's specified a minimum number of horizontal elements, this must be considered\n                if ( ( item.minimum_elements !== 0 ) && ( item._horizontal_elements.length <= item.minimum_elements ) ) {\n\n                    // all elements are moved to the vertical list\n                    tdPullDown._make_all_elements_vertical( item );\n\n\n\n\n                    // the horizontal header margin is set before return\n                    tdPullDown._prepare_horizontal_header( item );\n\n\n\n                    // the following checks are not more eligible to do\n                    return;\n\n                } else {\n\n                    // If the vertical list does not contain any elements yet,\n                    // the space for horizontal elements is minimized by the vertical top header width\n                    if ( 0 === item._vertical_elements.length ) {\n                        space_for_horizontal_elements -= item._vertical_jquery_obj_outer_width;\n                    }\n\n                    local_current_element = tdPullDown._make_element_vertical( item );\n                    space_for_horizontal_elements += local_current_element.calculated_width;\n                }\n            }\n\n\n\n            // This is the case when there's specified a no. of minimum horizontal elements and the horizontal list is empty.\n            // If the following conditions are accomplished the horizontal list is refilled with elements from the vertical list\n            //\n            //  - if there's specified a no. of minimum horizontal elements\n            //  - if there is no horizontal elements\n            //  - if there are vertical elements\n            //  - if there's enough horizontal space for the first vertical element\n\n            if ( ( 0 !== item.minimum_elements ) &&\n                ( 0 === item._horizontal_elements.length ) &&\n                ( item._vertical_elements.length > 0 ) &&\n                ( space_for_horizontal_elements >= item._vertical_elements[ 0 ].calculated_width ) ) {\n\n                // the necessary space needed for the minimum no. of horizontal elements\n                var local_necessary_space = 0;\n\n                for ( var j = 0; ( j < item.minimum_elements ) && ( j < item._vertical_elements.length ); j++ ) {\n                    local_necessary_space += item._vertical_elements[ j ].calculated_width;\n                }\n\n                // the necessary space really occupied by the minimum no. of horizontal elements\n                var local_space = 0;\n                var local_minimum_elements = item.minimum_elements;\n\n                while ( ( local_minimum_elements > 0 ) &&\n                    ( item._vertical_elements.length > 0 ) &&\n                    ( space_for_horizontal_elements >= local_necessary_space ) ) {\n\n                    local_current_element = tdPullDown._make_element_horizontal( item );\n\n                    if ( null !== local_current_element ) {\n                        local_space += local_current_element.calculated_width;\n                        local_minimum_elements--;\n                    } else {\n\n                        // the horizontal header margin is set before return\n                        tdPullDown._prepare_horizontal_header( item );\n\n                        return;\n                    }\n\n                }\n                space_for_horizontal_elements -= local_space;\n            }\n\n\n\n            // It's the case when there isn't specified a no. of minimum horizontal elements or it is specified and the\n            // horizontal list is not empty, and in the same time there's enough horizontal space for more elements\n            while ( ( ( item._horizontal_elements.length > 0 ) || ( 0 === item._horizontal_elements.length && 0 === item.minimum_elements ) ) &&\n                ( item._vertical_elements.length > 0 ) &&\n                ( space_for_horizontal_elements >= item._vertical_elements[ 0 ].calculated_width ) ) {\n\n                local_current_element = tdPullDown._make_element_horizontal( item );\n\n                if ( null !== local_current_element ) {\n                    space_for_horizontal_elements -= local_current_element.calculated_width;\n                } else {\n\n                    // the horizontal header margin is set before return\n                    tdPullDown._prepare_horizontal_header( item );\n\n                    return;\n                }\n            }\n\n\n\n            // if the vertical list contains just one element, the horizontal space for it must be calculated without considering the vertical top header width (ex.'More')\n            if ( ( 1 === item._vertical_elements.length ) &&\n                ( space_for_horizontal_elements + item._vertical_jquery_obj_outer_width >= item._vertical_elements[ 0 ].calculated_width ) ) {\n                tdPullDown._make_element_horizontal( item );\n            }\n\n\n            // the horizontal header margin is set before return\n            tdPullDown._prepare_horizontal_header( item );\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _prepare_horizontal_header: function _prepare_horizontal_header( item, clear_margin ) {\n            var block_title_jquery_obj = item.horizontal_jquery_obj.parent().siblings( '.block-title:first' );\n\n            if ( 1 === block_title_jquery_obj.length ) {\n                var content_element = block_title_jquery_obj.find( 'span:first' );\n\n                if ( 1 === content_element.length ) {\n\n                    if ( 'undefined' !== typeof( clear_margin ) && true === clear_margin ) {\n                        content_element.css( 'margin-right', 0 );\n                    } else {\n                        if ( 0 === item._horizontal_elements.length ) {\n                            content_element.css( 'margin-right', item._vertical_jquery_obj_outer_width + 'px' );\n                        } else {\n                            content_element.css( 'margin-right', 0 );\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _compute_all_items: function() {\n            for ( var i = tdPullDown.items.length - 1; i >= 0; i-- ) {\n\n                // a type check is done for every item in the item list\n                if ( tdPullDown.items[ i ].constructor === tdPullDown.item ) {\n                    tdPullDown._compute_item( tdPullDown.items[ i ] );\n                }\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _make_element_horizontal: function( item ) {\n\n            // the item must be initialized and the vertical list must contain at least an element\n            if ( false === item._is_initialized || 0 === item._vertical_elements.length ) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            // the first element of the vertical list is shifted\n            var local_element = item._vertical_elements.shift();\n\n            // the vertical list is shown when there's at least one vertical element\n            if ( 0 === item._vertical_elements.length ) {\n                item.vertical_jquery_obj.css( 'display', 'none' );\n            }\n\n            // the element is added on the last position in the horizontal list\n            item._horizontal_elements.push( local_element );\n\n            local_element.jquery_object.css( 'opacity', '0' );\n\n            // the DOM is changing\n            local_element.jquery_object.detach().appendTo( item.horizontal_jquery_obj );\n\n            setTimeout( function() {\n                local_element.jquery_object.css( 'opacity', '1' );\n            }, 50);\n\n            //tdPullDown.log('horizontal');\n\n            return local_element;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _make_element_vertical: function( item ) {\n\n            // the item must be initialized and the horizontal list must contain at least an element\n            if ( false === item._is_initialized || 0 === item._horizontal_elements.length ) {\n                return null;\n            }\n\n            // the last element of the horizontal list is popped out\n            var local_element = item._horizontal_elements.pop();\n\n            // the vertical list is hidden when there are no vertical elements\n            if ( 0 === item._vertical_elements.length ) {\n                item.vertical_jquery_obj.css( 'display', '' );\n            }\n\n            //the element is added on the first position into the vertical list\n            item._vertical_elements.unshift( local_element );\n\n            // the DOM is changed\n            local_element.jquery_object.detach().prependTo( item._vertical_ul_jquery_obj );\n\n            //tdPullDown.log('vertical');\n\n            return local_element;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _make_all_elements_vertical: function( item ) {\n            while ( item._horizontal_elements.length > 0 ) {\n                tdPullDown._make_element_vertical( item );\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n        td_events_resize: function() {\n\n            if ( 0 === tdPullDown.items.length ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            if ( true === tdPullDown.reinitialize_items_at_change_view_port && tdPullDown._view_port_interval_index !== tdViewport.getCurrentIntervalIndex() ) {\n                tdPullDown._reinitialize_all_items();\n            }\n\n            tdPullDown._compute_all_items();\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        log: function log( msg ) {\n            //console.log(msg);\n        }\n    };\n\n\n    tdPullDown.init();\n\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar td_fps = {\n\n    start_time: 0,\n\n    current_time: 0,\n\n    frame_number: 0,\n\n    init: function init() {\n        td_fps.start_time = 0;\n\n        var previous_result = 0,\n            result = 0,\n            elapsed_time = 0;\n\n        var td_fps_table = jQuery(\"#fps_table\");\n\n        if (td_fps_table.length == 0) {\n            td_fps_table = jQuery('<div>').css({\n                \"position\": \"fixed\",\n                \"top\": \"120px\",\n                \"left\": \"10px\",\n                \"width\": \"100px\",\n                \"height\": \"20px\",\n                \"border\": \"1px solid black\",\n                \"font-size\": \"11px\",\n                \"z-index\": \"100000\",\n                \"background-color\": \"white\"\n            });\n\n            td_fps_table.appendTo('body');\n        }\n\n        var get_fps = function() {\n            td_fps.frame_number++;\n            td_fps.current_time = Date.now();\n\n            elapsed_time = (td_fps.current_time - td_fps.start_time) / 1000;\n\n            result = (td_fps.frame_number / elapsed_time).toPrecision(2);\n\n            if (result != previous_result) {\n                previous_result = result;\n                td_fps_table.html(previous_result + ' fps');\n                //console.log(previous_result);\n            }\n\n            if (elapsed_time > 1) {\n                td_fps.start_time = td_fps.current_time;\n                td_fps.frame_number = 0;\n            }\n\n            requestAnimationFrame(get_fps);\n        };\n\n        get_fps();\n    }\n};\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdAnimationScroll = {};\n\n(function() {\n\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdAnimationScroll = {\n\n\n        // the bunch of tdAnimationScroll items\n        items: [],\n\n\n\n        // the current request animation frame id\n        rAFIndex: 0,\n\n\n\n        // flag used to not call 'requestAnimationFrame' when it's steel running\n        animation_running: false,\n\n\n\n        item: function item() {\n\n            // the computed percent value of the jquery object in the viewport\n            // - 0 when the top of object enters into the viewport\n            // - 100 when the bottom of the object goes outside of the viewport\n            this.percent_value = 0;\n\n            // the animation callback function\n            this.animation_callback = null;\n\n            // the jquery object of the tdAnimationScroll.item\n            this.jqueryObj = '';\n\n            // optional - a jquery object that wraps the current item. Used in callback\n            this.wrapper_jquery_obj = undefined;\n\n            // a jquery span obj added dynamically added at the top of jqueryObj\n            this.top_marker_jquery_obj = '';\n\n            // the full outer height of the item\n            this.full_height = 0;\n\n            // the offset top of the top_marker_jquery_obj\n            this.offset_top = '';\n\n            // the offset top of the top_marker_jquery_obj and the full_height\n            this.offset_bottom_top = '';\n\n            // the properties registered with the item\n            this.properties = {};\n\n            // the computed properties that probably will be applied by animation callback function over the jquery object\n            this.computed_item_properties = {};\n\n            // flag made 'true' for items having at least one computed property\n            this.redraw = false;\n\n            // top is out of screen\n            this.top_is_out = false;\n\n            // flag used to mark the initialization item\n            this._is_initialized = false;\n\n            // flag used to stop an item to be computed\n            this.computation_stopped = false;\n\n\n\n\n            \n            this.add_item_property = function add_item_property(name, start_percent, end_percent, start_value, end_value, easing) {\n\n                if (start_percent >= end_percent) {\n                    return;\n                }\n\n                if (undefined === this.properties[name]) {\n\n                    this.properties[name] = {\n                        computed_value: '',\n                        settings: []\n                    };\n\n                    if (0 !== start_percent) {\n                        this.properties[name].settings[this.properties[name].settings.length] = {\n                            start_percent: 0,\n                            end_percent: start_percent,\n                            start_value: start_value,\n                            end_value: start_value,\n                            easing: ''\n                        };\n                    }\n\n                    this.properties[name].settings[this.properties[name].settings.length] = {\n                        start_percent: start_percent,\n                        end_percent: end_percent,\n                        start_value: start_value,\n                        end_value: end_value,\n                        easing: easing\n                    };\n\n                    this.properties[name].settings[this.properties[name].settings.length] = {\n                        start_percent: end_percent,\n                        end_percent: 100,\n                        start_value: end_value,\n                        end_value: end_value,\n                        easing: ''\n                    };\n\n                } else {\n\n                    var last_setting = this.properties[name].settings[this.properties[name].settings.length - 1];\n\n                    if (last_setting.start_percent !== start_percent) {\n                        this.properties[name].settings[this.properties[name].settings.length - 1] = {\n                            start_percent: last_setting.start_percent,\n                            end_percent: start_percent,\n                            start_value: last_setting.end_value,\n                            end_value: last_setting.end_value,\n                            easing: ''\n                        };\n\n                        this.properties[name].settings[this.properties[name].settings.length] = {\n                            start_percent: start_percent,\n                            end_percent: end_percent,\n                            start_value: start_value,\n                            end_value: end_value,\n                            easing: easing\n                        };\n                    } else {\n                        this.properties[name].settings[this.properties[name].settings.length - 1] = {\n                            start_percent: start_percent,\n                            end_percent: end_percent,\n                            start_value: start_value,\n                            end_value: end_value,\n                            easing: easing\n                        };\n                    }\n\n                    if (100 !== end_percent) {\n                        this.properties[name].settings[this.properties[name].settings.length] = {\n                            start_percent: end_percent,\n                            end_percent: 100,\n                            start_value: end_value,\n                            end_value: end_value,\n                            easing: ''\n                        };\n                    }\n                }\n            };\n\n\n            \n            this.remove_item_property = function remove_item_property(name) {\n                if (undefined === this.properties[name]) {\n                    return false;\n                }\n\n                delete this.properties[name];\n\n                return true;\n            };\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        init: function init() {\n\n            tdAnimationScroll.items = [];\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        add_item: function add_item(item) {\n\n            if (item.constructor !== tdAnimationScroll.item) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // the item is added in the item list\n            tdAnimationScroll.items.push(item);\n\n            // the item is initialized only once when it is added\n            tdAnimationScroll._initialize_item(item);\n\n            // for efficiently rendering all items are computed at once, so do not compute item individually\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _initialize_item: function _initialize_item(item) {\n\n            // an item must be initialized only once\n            if (true === item._is_initialized) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // the item full height is computed\n            if (undefined === item.wrapper_jquery_obj) {\n                item.full_height = item.jqueryObj.outerHeight(true);\n            } else {\n                item.full_height = item.wrapper_jquery_obj.height();\n            }\n\n            if (0 === item.full_height) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            var new_jquery_obj_reference = jQuery('<div class=\"td_marker_animation\" style=\"height: 0; width: 0\">');\n\n            new_jquery_obj_reference.insertBefore(item.jqueryObj);\n\n            item.top_marker_jquery_obj = new_jquery_obj_reference;\n\n            item.offset_top = item.top_marker_jquery_obj.offset().top;\n\n            //console.log(\"initializare \" + tdAnimationScroll.items.length + \" : \" + item.top_marker_jquery_obj.offset().top);\n\n            item.offset_bottom_top = item.offset_top + item.full_height;\n\n            item.top_is_out = tdEvents.window_pageYOffset > item.offset_top;\n\n            // the item is marked as initialized, being ready to be computed\n            // for efficiently rendering all items are computed at once\n            item._is_initialized = true;\n\n\n            // maybe it's better to try a request animation frame after every initialization, for computing the already added items\n            //tdAnimationScroll.compute_all_items();\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        reinitialize_all_items: function reinitialize_all_items(recompute_height) {\n\n            for (var i = tdAnimationScroll.items.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {\n                tdAnimationScroll.reinitialize_item(tdAnimationScroll.items[i], recompute_height);\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n        reinitialize_item: function reinitialize_item(item, recompute_height) {\n\n            // a not initialized item can't be reinitialized\n            if (false === item._is_initialized) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // prevent the following item computing, till the reinitialization is finished\n            item._is_initialized = false;\n\n            item.offset_top = item.top_marker_jquery_obj.offset().top;\n\n            //console.log(\"reinitializare \" + tdAnimationScroll.items.length + \" : \" + item.top_marker_jquery_obj.offset().top);\n\n            if (true === recompute_height) {\n                if (undefined === item.wrapper_jquery_obj) {\n                    item.full_height = item.jqueryObj.outerHeight(true);\n                } else {\n                    item.full_height = item.wrapper_jquery_obj.height();\n                }\n\n                if (0 === item.full_height) {\n                    return;\n                }\n            }\n\n            item.offset_bottom_top = item.offset_top + item.full_height;\n\n            item._is_initialized = true;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _compute_item_properties: function _compute_item_properties(item) {\n\n            var computed_properties = {},\n                current_item_property;\n\n            for (var property in item.properties) {\n\n                if (true === item.properties.hasOwnProperty(property)) {\n\n                    current_item_property = item.properties[property];\n\n                    var current_setting,\n                        new_computed_value,\n                        local_computed_value,\n                        easing_step,\n                        easing_computed_value,\n                        easing_division_interval = 1000;\n\n                    for (var i = 0; i < current_item_property.settings.length; i++) {\n\n                        current_setting = current_item_property.settings[i];\n\n                        // the check is done using this form [...) of the interval or the last position 100%\n                        if ((current_setting.start_percent <= item.percent_value && item.percent_value < current_setting.end_percent) ||\n                            (item.percent_value === current_setting.end_percent && 100 === item.percent_value)) {\n\n                            if (current_setting.start_value === current_setting.end_value) {\n\n                                new_computed_value = current_setting.start_value;\n\n                            } else {\n\n                                // local computed value can have a positive value or a negative value, it depends of the difference end_value - start_value\n                                // for a linear easing function, the new computed value is the start_value + local_computed_value\n                                // if start_value < end_value, the variable local_computed_value is positive\n                                // if start_value > end_value, the variable local_computed_value is negative\n                                local_computed_value = (item.percent_value - current_setting.start_percent) / (current_setting.end_percent - current_setting.start_percent) * (current_setting.end_value - current_setting.start_value);\n\n\n                                // if there's specified an easing function, it's applied over the computed_value\n                                if ((undefined === current_setting.easing) || ('' === current_setting.easing)) {\n\n                                    // linear easing function\n\n                                    new_computed_value = current_setting.start_value + local_computed_value;\n\n                                } else {\n\n                                    // specifying an easing function\n\n                                    easing_step = Math.abs(current_setting.start_value - current_setting.end_value) / easing_division_interval;\n\n                                    if (current_setting.start_value < current_setting.end_value) {\n\n                                        easing_computed_value = current_setting.start_value + jQuery.easing[current_setting.easing](\n                                            null,\n                                            local_computed_value,\n                                            0,\n                                            easing_step,\n                                            current_setting.end_value - current_setting.start_value) * easing_division_interval;\n\n                                    } else {\n\n                                        easing_computed_value = current_setting.start_value - jQuery.easing[current_setting.easing](\n                                            null,\n                                            -local_computed_value,\n                                            0,\n                                            easing_step,\n                                            current_setting.start_value - current_setting.end_value) * easing_division_interval;\n                                    }\n\n                                    new_computed_value = easing_computed_value;\n\n                                    //console.log(current_setting.easing + ' : ' + easing_step + ' ~ ' + easing_computed_value + ' ~ ' + (current_setting.start_value + computed_value) + ' & ' + current_setting.start_value + ' $ ' + current_setting.end_value);\n                                }\n                            }\n\n                            // if the existing computed value is different, the new computed value is cached\n                            if (current_item_property.computed_value !== new_computed_value) {\n                                current_item_property.computed_value = new_computed_value;\n                                computed_properties[property] = new_computed_value;\n\n                                // the item is marked that it has at least one property that need to be redraw\n                                // the animation callback functions are called just for the marked items\n                                item.redraw = true;\n                            }\n                            break;\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n\n            // a plain javascript object is added if there is no computed property\n            item.computed_item_properties = computed_properties;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        compute_item: function compute_item(item) {\n            //console.clear();\n\n            // the item must be initialized first\n            if (false === item._is_initialized) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            var percent_display_value = 0;\n\n            if (tdEvents.window_pageYOffset + tdEvents.window_innerHeight >= item.offset_top) {\n\n                if (tdEvents.window_pageYOffset > item.offset_bottom_top) {\n                    percent_display_value = 100;\n                } else {\n                    percent_display_value = (tdEvents.window_pageYOffset + tdEvents.window_innerHeight - item.offset_top) * 100 / (tdEvents.window_innerHeight + item.full_height);\n                }\n            }\n\n            //console.log(window.pageYOffset + ' : ' + item.offset_top + ' : ' + item.offset_bottom_top);\n\n            if (item.percent_value !== percent_display_value) {\n                item.percent_value = percent_display_value;\n                tdAnimationScroll._compute_item_properties(item);\n            }\n\n            item.top_is_out = tdEvents.window_pageYOffset > item.offset_top;\n\n\n            //console.log(percent_display_value);\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        compute_all_items: function compute_all_items() {\n            //tdAnimationScroll.animate();\n\n            if (false === tdAnimationScroll.animation_running) {\n                tdAnimationScroll.rAFIndex = window.requestAnimationFrame( tdAnimationScroll._animate_all_items );\n            }\n\n            tdAnimationScroll.animation_running = true;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        _animate_all_items: function _animate_all_items() {\n            //var start_time = Date.now();\n\n            for (var i = 0; i < tdAnimationScroll.items.length; i++) {\n                if ( false === tdAnimationScroll.items[i].computation_stopped) {\n                    tdAnimationScroll.compute_item(tdAnimationScroll.items[i]);\n                }\n            }\n\n            for (var j = 0; j < tdAnimationScroll.items.length; j++) {\n                if (true === tdAnimationScroll.items[j].redraw) {\n                    tdAnimationScroll.items[j].animation_callback();\n                }\n            }\n\n            tdAnimationScroll.animation_running = false;\n\n            //var end_time = Date.now();\n            //\n            //var debug_table = jQuery(\"#debug_table\");\n            //debug_table.html((end_time - start_time) + ' ms');\n        },\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n        td_events_resize: function td_events_resize() {\n\n            if (0 === tdAnimationScroll.items.length) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // this will be applied if it depends just by view port changing\n\n            //if (tdAnimationScroll._changed_view_port_width()) {\n            //    tdAnimationScroll.reinitialize_all_items();\n            //}\n\n            tdAnimationScroll.reinitialize_all_items(false);\n\n            tdAnimationScroll.compute_all_items();\n        },\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        log: function log(msg) {\n            //console.log(msg);\n        }\n    };\n\n    tdAnimationScroll.init();\n\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdBackstr = {};\n\n(function(){\n\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdBackstr = {\n\n\n        items: [],\n\n\n        item: function() {\n\n            // check if is necessary to apply modification (css)\n            this.previous_value = 0;\n\n            // the image aspect ratio\n            this.image_aspect_rate = 0;\n\n            // the wrapper jquery object\n            this.wrapper_image_jquery_obj = '';\n\n            // the image jquery object\n            this.image_jquery_obj = '';\n        },\n\n\n        \n        add_item: function( item ) {\n\n            if ( item.constructor !== tdBackstr.item ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            //if ((item.image_jquery_obj.complete)\n            //\n            //    // this is a case when the image is still not loaded but the height() and width() return both 24px\n            //    // @todo it must be modified. It's used because for backstretch are usually used large images\n            //    && ((item.image_jquery_obj.height() != 24) && (item.image_jquery_obj.width() != 24))\n            //)\n\n            if ( item.image_jquery_obj.get( 0 ).complete ) {\n                tdBackstr._load_item_image( item );\n\n            } else {\n\n                item.image_jquery_obj.on( 'load', function() {\n                    tdBackstr._load_item_image( item );\n                });\n\n\n                //var currentTimeStart = Date.now();\n                //\n                //var loaded_image_jquery_ojb = false;\n                //\n                //item.image_jquery_obj.on('load', function() {\n                //\n                //    loaded_image_jquery_ojb = true;\n                //\n                //\n                //    tdBackstr._load_item_image(item);\n                //    console.log('backstr tarziu ' + item.image_jquery_obj.height() + ' > timp : ' + (Date.now() - currentTimeStart));\n                //});\n                //\n                //\n                //var indexInterval = setInterval(function() {\n                //    if (loaded_image_jquery_ojb) {\n                //        clearInterval(indexInterval);\n                //        console.log('imagine incarcata ' + item.image_jquery_obj.height() + ' > timp : ' + (Date.now() - currentTimeStart));\n                //    }\n                //}, 0);\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        _load_item_image: function( item ) {\n            item.image_aspect_rate = item.image_jquery_obj.width() / item.image_jquery_obj.height();\n            tdBackstr.items.push( item );\n            tdBackstr._compute_item( item );\n\n            item.image_jquery_obj.css( 'opacity', '1' );\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _compute_item: function( item ) {\n\n            // the wrapper aspect ratio can vary, so it's recomputed at computing item\n            var wrapper_aspect_rate = item.wrapper_image_jquery_obj.width() / item.wrapper_image_jquery_obj.height();\n\n            var current_value = 0;\n\n            if ( wrapper_aspect_rate < item.image_aspect_rate ) {\n\n                current_value = 1;\n\n                if ( item.previous_value !== current_value ) {\n                    item.image_jquery_obj.removeClass( 'td-stretch-width' );\n                    item.image_jquery_obj.addClass( 'td-stretch-height' );\n\n                    item.previous_value = current_value;\n                }\n            } else {\n\n                current_value = 2;\n\n                if ( item.previous_value !== current_value ) {\n                    item.image_jquery_obj.removeClass( 'td-stretch-height' );\n                    item.image_jquery_obj.addClass( 'td-stretch-width' );\n\n                    item.previous_value = current_value;\n                }\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _compute_all_items: function() {\n            for ( var i = 0; i < tdBackstr.items.length; i++ ) {\n                tdBackstr._compute_item( tdBackstr.items[ i ] );\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        td_events_resize: function() {\n\n            if ( 0 === tdBackstr.items.length ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            tdBackstr._compute_all_items();\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        log: function( msg ) {\n            window.console.log( msg );\n        }\n    };\n\n\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdAnimationStack = {};\n\n( function() {\n\n    \"use strict\";\n\n    tdAnimationStack = {\n\n        \n\n\n\n\n        // - flag css class used by the non 'type0' animation effect\n        // - flag used just to look for not yet computed item\n        // - it's set by ready_init (on ready)\n        // - all dom components that need to be animated will be marked with this css class in ready_init\n        // - it can be used for a precomputed style, but carefully, because it's applied at ready_init (on ready)\n        _animation_css_class1: '',\n\n\n\n        // - flag css class used by the non 'type0' animation effect\n        // - flag css class used to animate custom\n        // - this css class applies the final animation\n        _animation_css_class2: '',\n\n\n\n        // - the default animation effect 'type0' is applied if the global window.td_animation_stack_effect is the empty string\n        // - it's used for consistency of animation effects presented into the animation-stack.less [all types have a name (...type...)]\n        _animation_default_effect: 'type0',\n\n\n\n        // - tdAnimationStack runs just only when this flag is true\n        // - it's done true by the init function\n        activated: false,\n\n\n\n        // flag checked by the major animation operations\n        _ready_for_initialization: true,\n\n        // interval used by ready_init to check tdAnimationStack state\n        _ready_init_timeout: undefined,\n\n\n        // max time[ms] interval waiting for first tdAnimationStack.init call\n        max_waiting_for_init: 3000,\n\n\n\n        // the specific selectors are used to look for new elements inside of the specific sections\n        _specific_selectors: '',\n\n        // the general selectors are used to look for elements over extend areas in DOM\n        _general_selectors: '',\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n        ready_init: function() {\n\n            // - special case for IE8 and IE9 (and if Visual Composer image carousel exists)\n            // Important! The Visual Compose images carousel has hidden elements (images) that does not allow for computing the real position of the other DOM elements in the viewport\n            // - the animation is forced removed and the altered css body is cleaned\n            if ( tdDetect.isIe8 || tdDetect.isIe9 || ( jQuery( '.vc_images_carousel' ).length > 0 ) ) {\n                tdAnimationStack._ready_for_initialization = false;\n\n                if ( undefined !== window.td_animation_stack_effect ) {\n                    if ( '' === window.td_animation_stack_effect ) {\n                        window.td_animation_stack_effect = tdAnimationStack._animation_default_effect;\n                    }\n                    jQuery( 'body' ).removeClass( 'td-animation-stack-' + window.td_animation_stack_effect );\n                }\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            if ( undefined === window.tds_animation_stack || undefined === window.td_animation_stack_effect ) {\n\n                // lock any further operation using the _ready_for_initialization flag\n                tdAnimationStack._ready_for_initialization = false;\n\n            } else {\n\n                // the tdAnimationStack._specific_selectors is set by the global variable window.td_animation_stack_specific_selectors\n                if ( undefined !== window.td_animation_stack_specific_selectors ) {\n                    tdAnimationStack._specific_selectors = window.td_animation_stack_specific_selectors;\n                }\n\n\n                // if the global variable window.td_animation_stack_effect has the empty string value, the 'full fade' (type0) effect is prepared to be applied\n                if ( '' === window.td_animation_stack_effect ) {\n                    window.td_animation_stack_effect = tdAnimationStack._animation_default_effect;\n                }\n\n                tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 = 'td-animation-stack-' + window.td_animation_stack_effect + '-1';\n                tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class2 = 'td-animation-stack-' + window.td_animation_stack_effect + '-2';\n\n\n                // - the tdAnimationStack._general_selectors is set by the global variable window.td_animation_stack_general_selectors\n                if ( undefined !== window.td_animation_stack_general_selectors ) {\n                    tdAnimationStack._general_selectors = window.td_animation_stack_general_selectors;\n                }\n\n                // the tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 css class is applied for all elements need to be animated later\n                jQuery( tdAnimationStack._general_selectors ).addClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 );\n\n\n                // - timeout used by the ready_init function, to cut down tdAnimationStack.init calling at loading page, when the call comes too late\n                // - if tdAnimationStack.init comes earlier, it does a clearTimeout call over the tdAnimationStack._ready_init_timeout variable\n                tdAnimationStack._ready_init_timeout = setTimeout( function() {\n\n                    // if tdAnimationStack is activated, do nothing\n                    if ( true === tdAnimationStack.activated ) {\n                        return;\n                    }\n\n                    // lock any further operation using the _ready_for_initialization flag\n                    tdAnimationStack._ready_for_initialization = false;\n\n                    // remove the loading animation css class effect from the body\n                    // this class is applied from the theme settings\n                    if ( undefined !== window.td_animation_stack_effect ) {\n                        jQuery( 'body' ).removeClass( 'td-animation-stack-' + window.td_animation_stack_effect );\n                    }\n\n                }, tdAnimationStack.max_waiting_for_init );\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        // flag marks items where they are\n        _ITEM_TO_VIEW_PORT: {\n\n            ITEM_ABOVE_VIEW_PORT: 0,\n\n            ITEM_IN_VIEW_PORT: 1,\n\n            ITEM_UNDER_VIEW_PORT: 2\n        },\n\n\n        // predefined sorting methods\n        SORTED_METHOD: {\n\n            sort_left_to_right: function sort_left_to_right( item1, item2 ) {\n                if ( item1.offset_top > item2.offset_top ) {\n                    return 1;\n                } else if ( item1.offset_top < item2.offset_top ) {\n                    return -1;\n                } else if ( item1._order > item2._order ) {\n                    return 1;\n                } else if ( item1._order < item2._order ) {\n                    return -1;\n                }\n                return 0;\n            },\n\n\n            sort_right_to_left: function sort_right_to_left( item1, item2 ) {\n                if ( item1.offset_top > item2.offset_top ) {\n                    return 1;\n                } else if ( item1.offset_top < item2.offset_top ) {\n                    return -1;\n                } else if ( item1._order > item2._order ) {\n                    return -1;\n                } else if ( item1._order < item2._order ) {\n                    return 1;\n                }\n                return -1;\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        // keeps the DOM reading order, used in the sorting methods\n        _order: 0,\n\n\n        // interval divided to animate items\n        // ex. interval 100 and 2 items => one item at 100 / 2 and one item at 100 / 1, but not lower than min_interval and not higher than max_interval\n        interval: 70,\n\n        // min interval of a set timer\n        min_interval: 17,\n\n        // max interval of a set timer\n        max_interval: 40,\n\n\n\n        // keep current setInterval\n        _current_interval: undefined,\n\n        // items in view port are moved here\n        _items_in_view_port: [],\n\n        // items above the view port are moved here\n        _items_above_view_port: [],\n\n        // all items that will be processed\n        items: [],\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n        \n        item: function() {\n            // offset from the top of the item, to the top\n            // it's set at the initialization item\n            this.offset_top = undefined;\n\n\n            // offset from the bottom of the item, to the top\n            // it's set at the initialization item\n            this.offset_bottom_to_top = undefined;\n\n\n            // jquery object reference\n            // it's set before the initialization of the item\n            this.jqueryObj = undefined;\n\n\n            // the reading order from DOM\n            // it's set at the initialization item\n            this._order = undefined;\n        },\n\n\n\n\n        \n        //add_item: function add_item(item) {\n        //\n        //    if (item.constructor != tdAnimationStack.item) {\n        //        return;\n        //    }\n        //\n        //    tdAnimationStack.items.push(item);\n        //},\n\n\n\n        \n        _initialize_item: function( item ) {\n            item._order = tdAnimationStack._order++;\n\n            item.offset_top = item.jqueryObj.offset().top;\n            //item.offset_relative = Math.sqrt(Math.pow(item.jqueryObj.offset().top, 2) + Math.pow(item.jqueryObj.offset().left, 2));\n\n            item.offset_bottom_to_top = item.offset_top + item.jqueryObj.height();\n\n            //item.jqueryObj.parent().prepend('<div class=\"debug_item\" style=\"position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 20px; border: 1px solid red; background-color: white\">' + item.offset_top + '</div>');\n        },\n\n\n        \n        check_for_new_items: function( selector, sort_type, in_view_port ) {\n\n            // tdAnimationStack must be activated and not stopped for initialization by the ready_init checker\n            if ( ( false === tdAnimationStack.activated ) || ( false === tdAnimationStack._ready_for_initialization ) ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            if ( undefined === selector ) {\n                selector = '';\n            }\n\n\n\n            // the local stack of searched items\n            var local_stack = [];\n\n\n\n            //if (window.td_animation_stack_effect === 'type0') {\n            //    // for every founded element there's an instantiated tdAnimationStack.item, then initialized and added to the local stack\n            //    var founded_elements = jQuery(selector + ', .post').find(tdAnimationStack._specific_selectors).filter(function() {\n            //        return jQuery(this).css('opacity') === '0';\n            //    });\n            //\n            //} else {\n                jQuery( tdAnimationStack._general_selectors).not( '.' + tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class2 ).addClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 );\n\n                // for every founded element there's an instantiated tdAnimationStack.item, then initialized and added to the local stack\n                var founded_elements = jQuery( selector + ', .post' ).find( tdAnimationStack._specific_selectors ).filter( function() {\n                    return jQuery( this ).hasClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 );\n                });\n            //}\n\n\n\n            founded_elements.each( function( index, element ) {\n\n                var item_animation_stack = new tdAnimationStack.item();\n\n                item_animation_stack.jqueryObj = jQuery( element );\n\n                tdAnimationStack.log( index );\n\n                tdAnimationStack._initialize_item( item_animation_stack );\n\n                local_stack.push( item_animation_stack );\n            });\n\n\n\n            // new scope having its own timer used for checking not yet loaded images\n            ( function(){\n\n                var images_loaded = true;\n\n                for ( var i = 0; i < local_stack.length; i++ ) {\n\n                    // for every image element the 'complete' property is checked\n                    // \"If the image is finished loading, the complete property returns true\"\n                    // when tdAnimationStack.init is called on load, as normally, it calls tdAnimationStack.check_for_new_items and all these element has 'complete' property true\n                    // when tdAnimationStack.check_for_new_items is called by block's ajax response, the next timer is used to wait for all elements being loaded\n                    if ( false === founded_elements[ i ].complete ) {\n                        images_loaded = false;\n                        break;\n                    }\n                }\n\n                // if there's at least one element not loaded, a timer is started to wait for\n                if ( false === images_loaded ) {\n\n                    var date = new Date();\n                    var start_time = date.getTime();\n\n\n                    tdAnimationStack.log( 'TIMER - started' );\n\n\n                    // the timer is started\n                    var interval_check_loading_image = setInterval( function() {\n\n                        // if there's too much time waiting for image loading, they are made visible\n                        var date = new Date();\n\n                        var i = 0;\n\n                        if ( ( date.getTime() - start_time ) > tdAnimationStack.max_waiting_for_init ) {\n\n                            clearInterval( interval_check_loading_image );\n\n                            for ( i = 0; i < local_stack.length; i++ ) {\n\n\n\n\n                                //if (window.td_animation_stack_effect === 'type0') {\n                                //    local_stack[i].jqueryObj.css('opacity', 1);\n                                //} else {\n                                    local_stack[ i ].jqueryObj.removeClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 );\n                                    local_stack[ i ].jqueryObj.addClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class2 );\n                                //}\n\n\n\n\n\n\n                            }\n                            return;\n                        }\n\n\n                        // at every interval step, the element's 'complete' property is checked again\n                        images_loaded = true;\n\n                        for ( i = 0; i < local_stack.length; i++ ) {\n\n                            if ( false === founded_elements[ i ].complete ) {\n                                images_loaded = false;\n                                break;\n                            }\n                        }\n\n                        if ( true === images_loaded ) {\n\n                            clearInterval( interval_check_loading_image );\n\n                            tdAnimationStack.log( 'TIMER - stopped' );\n\n                            tdAnimationStack._precompute_items( local_stack, sort_type, in_view_port );\n                            tdAnimationStack.compute_items();\n                        }\n\n                    }, 100);\n\n                } else {\n                    tdAnimationStack._precompute_items( local_stack, sort_type, in_view_port );\n                    tdAnimationStack.compute_items();\n                }\n\n            })();\n\n            tdAnimationStack.log( 'checked for new items finished' );\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _precompute_items: function( stack_items, sort_type, in_view_port ) {\n\n            stack_items.sort( sort_type );\n\n            if ( true === in_view_port ) {\n\n                while ( stack_items.length > 0 ) {\n                    tdAnimationStack.log( 'add item 1 : ' + stack_items.length );\n                    tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.push( stack_items.shift() );\n                }\n\n            } else {\n\n                while (stack_items.length > 0) {\n                    tdAnimationStack.log( 'add item 2 : ' + stack_items.length );\n                    tdAnimationStack.items.push( stack_items.shift() );\n                }\n            }\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        init: function() {\n            if ( undefined === window.tds_animation_stack ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // tdAnimationStack must not be already stopped for initialization by a pre_init checker\n            if ( false === tdAnimationStack._ready_for_initialization ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // clear the _ready_init_timeout, to stop it doing more checking\n            clearTimeout( tdAnimationStack._ready_init_timeout );\n\n            // the tdAnimationStack is activated\n            tdAnimationStack.activated = true;\n\n            tdAnimationStack.check_for_new_items( '.td-animation-stack', tdAnimationStack.SORTED_METHOD.sort_left_to_right, false );\n        },\n\n\n        \n        reinit: function() {\n\n            // tdAnimationStack must not be already stopped for initialization by a pre_init checker\n            if ( false === tdAnimationStack._ready_for_initialization ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            tdAnimationStack.items = [];\n            tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port = [];\n            tdAnimationStack._items_above_view_port = [];\n\n            tdAnimationStack.init();\n        },\n\n\n        \n        compute_items: function() {\n\n            // tdAnimationStack must be activated and not stopped for initialization by the ready_init checker\n            if ( ( false === tdAnimationStack.activated ) || ( false === tdAnimationStack._ready_for_initialization ) ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            // the tdAnimationStack.items are processed\n            tdAnimationStack._separate_items();\n\n            // the items above the port view are animated\n            while ( tdAnimationStack._items_above_view_port.length > 0 ) {\n                tdAnimationStack.log( 'animation - above the view port' );\n\n                var item_above_view_port = tdAnimationStack._items_above_view_port.shift();\n\n\n\n                //if (window.td_animation_stack_effect === 'type0') {\n                //    item_above_view_port.jqueryObj.css('opacity', 1);\n                //} else {\n                    item_above_view_port.jqueryObj.removeClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 );\n                    item_above_view_port.jqueryObj.addClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class2 );\n                //}\n\n\n\n\n            }\n\n\n            // the items in the port view are prepared to be animated\n            if ( tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.length > 0 ) {\n\n                // clear any opened interval by a previous compute_items call\n                clearInterval( tdAnimationStack._current_interval );\n\n                var current_animation_item = tdAnimationStack._get_item_from_view_port();\n\n\n\n\n                //if (window.td_animation_stack_effect === 'type0') {\n                //    current_animation_item.jqueryObj.css('opacity', 1);\n                //} else {\n                    current_animation_item.jqueryObj.removeClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 );\n                    current_animation_item.jqueryObj.addClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class2 );\n    //            }\n\n\n\n\n\n                if ( tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.length > 0 ) {\n\n                    tdAnimationStack.log( 'start animation timer' );\n\n                    tdAnimationStack._to_timer( tdAnimationStack._get_right_interval( tdAnimationStack.interval * ( 1 / tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.length ) ) );\n                }\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _to_timer: function( interval ) {\n\n            tdAnimationStack._current_interval = setInterval( function () {\n\n                if ( tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.length > 0 ) {\n\n                    var current_animation_item = tdAnimationStack._get_item_from_view_port();\n\n                    tdAnimationStack.log( 'animation at interval: ' + interval );\n\n\n\n\n                    //if (window.td_animation_stack_effect === 'type0') {\n                    //    current_animation_item.jqueryObj.css('opacity', 1);\n                    //} else {\n                        current_animation_item.jqueryObj.removeClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class1 );\n                        current_animation_item.jqueryObj.addClass( tdAnimationStack._animation_css_class2 );\n                    //}\n\n\n\n\n                    clearInterval( tdAnimationStack._current_interval );\n\n                    if ( tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.length > 0 ) {\n                        tdAnimationStack._to_timer( tdAnimationStack._get_right_interval( tdAnimationStack.interval * ( 1 / tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.length ) ) );\n                    }\n                }\n            }, interval );\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _get_item_from_view_port: function() {\n\n            return tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.shift();\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        _get_right_interval: function( interval ) {\n\n            if ( interval < tdAnimationStack.min_interval ) {\n                return tdAnimationStack.min_interval;\n\n            } else if ( interval > tdAnimationStack.max_interval ) {\n                return tdAnimationStack.max_interval;\n            }\n            return interval;\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _item_to_view_port: function( item ) {\n\n            tdAnimationStack.log( 'position item relative to the view port >> ' + tdEvents.window_pageYOffset + tdEvents.window_innerHeight + ' : ' + item.offset_top );\n\n            if ( tdEvents.window_pageYOffset + tdEvents.window_innerHeight < item.offset_top ) {\n                return tdAnimationStack._ITEM_TO_VIEW_PORT.ITEM_UNDER_VIEW_PORT;\n\n            } else if ( ( tdEvents.window_pageYOffset + tdEvents.window_innerHeight >= item.offset_top ) && ( tdEvents.window_pageYOffset <= item.offset_bottom_to_top ) ) {\n                return tdAnimationStack._ITEM_TO_VIEW_PORT.ITEM_IN_VIEW_PORT;\n\n            }\n            return tdAnimationStack._ITEM_TO_VIEW_PORT.ITEM_ABOVE_VIEW_PORT;\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _separate_items: function() {\n            if ( 0 === tdAnimationStack.items.length ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            while ( tdAnimationStack.items.length > 0 ) {\n                var item_to_view_port = tdAnimationStack._item_to_view_port( tdAnimationStack.items[ 0 ] );\n\n                switch ( item_to_view_port ) {\n                    case tdAnimationStack._ITEM_TO_VIEW_PORT.ITEM_ABOVE_VIEW_PORT :\n                        tdAnimationStack._items_above_view_port.push( tdAnimationStack.items.shift() );\n                        break;\n\n                    case tdAnimationStack._ITEM_TO_VIEW_PORT.ITEM_IN_VIEW_PORT :\n                        tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.push( tdAnimationStack.items.shift() );\n                        break;\n\n                    case tdAnimationStack._ITEM_TO_VIEW_PORT.ITEM_UNDER_VIEW_PORT :\n                        tdAnimationStack.log( 'after separation items >> above: ' + tdAnimationStack._items_above_view_port.length + ' in: ' + tdAnimationStack._items_in_view_port.length + ' under: ' + tdAnimationStack.items.length );\n                        return;\n                }\n            }\n        },\n\n\n        \n        td_events_scroll: function() {\n            tdAnimationStack.compute_items();\n        },\n\n\n\n        \n        td_events_resize: function() {\n            // clear an existing interval\n            clearInterval( tdAnimationStack._current_interval );\n\n            // reinitialize tdAnimationStack searching in page for not already animated items [which were already repositioned by resize]\n            tdAnimationStack.reinit();\n        },\n\n\n\n        log: function( msg ) {\n            //console.log(msg);\n        }\n\n    };\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n'use strict';\n\n\ntdAffix.init({\n    menu_selector: '.td-header-menu-wrap',\n    menu_wrap_selector: '.td-header-menu-wrap-full',\n    tds_snap_menu: tdUtil.getBackendVar('tds_snap_menu'),\n    tds_snap_menu_logo: tdUtil.getBackendVar('tds_logo_on_sticky'),\n    menu_affix_height: 48,   // value must be set because it can't be computed at runtime because at the time of td_affix.init() we can have no affixed menu on page\n    menu_affix_height_on_mobile: 54\n});\n\n\n\n\nif (tdUtil.getBackendVar('tds_smart_sidebar') == 'enabled' && tdDetect.isIos === false) {\n    jQuery(window).load(function() {\n        // find the rows and the sidebars objects and add them to the magic sidebar object array\n        jQuery('.td-ss-row').each(function () {\n            //@todo check to see if the sidebar + content is pressent\n            var td_smart_sidebar_item = new tdSmartSidebar.item();\n            td_smart_sidebar_item.sidebar_jquery_obj = jQuery(this).children('.td-pb-span4').children('.wpb_wrapper');\n            td_smart_sidebar_item.content_jquery_obj = jQuery(this).children('.td-pb-span8').children('.wpb_wrapper');\n            tdSmartSidebar.add_item(td_smart_sidebar_item);\n        });\n\n\n\n        // check the page to see if we have smart sidebar classes (.td-ss-main-content and .td-ss-main-sidebar)\n        if (jQuery('.td-ss-main-content').length > 0 && jQuery('.td-ss-main-sidebar').length > 0) {\n            var td_smart_sidebar_item = new tdSmartSidebar.item();\n            td_smart_sidebar_item.sidebar_jquery_obj = jQuery('.td-ss-main-sidebar');\n            td_smart_sidebar_item.content_jquery_obj = jQuery('.td-ss-main-content');\n            tdSmartSidebar.add_item(td_smart_sidebar_item);\n        }\n\n        tdSmartSidebar.td_events_resize();\n    });\n}\n\n\n\n\n// block subcategory ajax filters!\njQuery('.td-subcat-filter').each(function(index, element) {\n    var jquery_object_container = jQuery(element);\n    var horizontal_jquery_obj = jquery_object_container.find('.td-subcat-list:first');\n\n    var pulldown_item_obj = new tdPullDown.item();\n    pulldown_item_obj.blockUid = jquery_object_container.parent().data('td-block-uid'); // get the block UID\n    pulldown_item_obj.horizontal_jquery_obj = horizontal_jquery_obj;\n    pulldown_item_obj.vertical_jquery_obj = jquery_object_container.find('.td-subcat-dropdown:first');\n    pulldown_item_obj.horizontal_element_css_class = 'td-subcat-item';\n    pulldown_item_obj.container_jquery_obj = horizontal_jquery_obj.parents('.td_block_wrap:first');\n    pulldown_item_obj.excluded_jquery_elements = [horizontal_jquery_obj.parent().siblings('.block-title:first')];\n    tdPullDown.add_item(pulldown_item_obj);\n});\n\n\n// on category pages\njQuery('.td-category-siblings').each(function(index, element) {\n    var jquery_object_container = jQuery(element);\n    var horizontal_jquery_obj = jquery_object_container.find('.td-category:first');\n\n    var pulldown_item_obj = new tdPullDown.item();\n    pulldown_item_obj.horizontal_jquery_obj = horizontal_jquery_obj;\n    pulldown_item_obj.vertical_jquery_obj = jquery_object_container.find('.td-subcat-dropdown:first');\n    pulldown_item_obj.horizontal_element_css_class = 'entry-category';\n    pulldown_item_obj.container_jquery_obj = horizontal_jquery_obj.parents('.td-category-siblings:first');\n    tdPullDown.add_item(pulldown_item_obj);\n\n});\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n// array keeping the tdAnimationScroll.item items used for backstretch\nvar td_backstretch_items = [];\n\n\njQuery(window).ready(function() {\n\n    jQuery('.td-backstretch').each(function (index, element) {\n\n        if (!jQuery(element).hasClass('not-parallax')) {\n\n            var item = new tdAnimationScroll.item();\n            item.jqueryObj = jQuery(element);\n            item.wrapper_jquery_obj = item.jqueryObj.parent();\n\n            // - ideal translation is when the top of wrapper_jquery_obj is at the top of the view port, the jqueryObj image\n            // is also already translated at the top of the view port\n            // - the start_value should be item.wrapper_jquery_obj.offset().top + how much the jqueryObj was translated\n\n            tdAnimationScroll.add_item(item);\n\n            // we keep the tdAnimationScroll.item to change operation settings when the viewport is changing\n            td_backstretch_items.push(item);\n\n            td_compute_backstretch_item(item);\n        }\n    });\n\n\n    jQuery('.td-parallax-header').each(function (index, element) {\n\n        var item = new tdAnimationScroll.item();\n        item.jqueryObj = jQuery(element);\n\n        item.add_item_property('move_y', 50, 100, 0, 100, '');\n        item.add_item_property('opacity', 50, 100, 1, 0, '');\n\n        item.animation_callback = function () {\n\n            var move_y_property = parseFloat(item.computed_item_properties['move_y']).toFixed();\n            var opacity_property = parseFloat(item.computed_item_properties['opacity']);\n\n            item.jqueryObj.css({\n                '-webkit-transform': 'translate3d(0px,' + move_y_property + 'px, 0px)',\n                'transform': 'translate3d(0px,' + move_y_property + 'px, 0px)'\n            });\n\n            item.jqueryObj.css('transform', 'translate3d(0px,' + move_y_property + 'px, 0px)');\n\n            item.jqueryObj.css('opacity', opacity_property);\n\n            item.redraw = false;\n        }\n\n        tdAnimationScroll.add_item(item);\n    });\n\n\n    tdAnimationScroll.compute_all_items();\n\n\n\n\n    // load animation stack\n    tdAnimationStack.ready_init();\n});\n\n\n\n\n\nfunction td_compute_backstretch_item(item) {\n\n        // Important! The following variables must be computed after add_item calling function, because they need item.full_height, item.offset_top, etc\n\n        // percent when the object is in initial position\n        // Important! It doesn't matter if the document is scrolled\n        var initial_percent = (tdEvents.window_innerHeight - item.offset_top) * 100 / (tdEvents.window_innerHeight + item.full_height);\n\n        // percent when the object has its top at the top of the window\n        var intermediary_top_percent =  (tdEvents.window_innerHeight) * 100 / (tdEvents.window_innerHeight + item.full_height);\n\n\n        // IMPORTANT! We suppose the item.offset_top is positive\n\n\n        // the value used to compute the scale_factor\n        // Important! It can be any value\n        var scale_seed = item.offset_top / 4;\n\n        // if item.offset_top is zero, we set the scale_seed at a custom value\n        if (scale_seed == 0) {\n            scale_seed = 100;\n        }\n\n        // the start_value is half of the scale_seed, so the object [image] is translated as its bottom is at the bottom of its view\n        var start_value = - scale_seed / 2;\n\n\n        // DO NOT DELETE THE NEXT CODE LINES. The right value would be the next, but the divide operation does not have 100% accuracy, so we increase the interval\n        // and so we are sure the object is not translated more than needed when is at the top of the window\n        //\n        // When the top of the view is at the top of the window, the object [image] must be already translated at the top of the window.\n        //\n        //var end_value = ((100 - initial_percent) * scale_seed) / (intermediary_top_percent - initial_percent);;\n        //\n        //or actually\n        //\n        //var end_value = ((100 - initial_percent) * (item.offset_top / 2)) / (intermediary_top_percent - initial_percent);;\n\n        var end_value = ((100 - initial_percent) * (scale_seed / 1.2)) / (intermediary_top_percent - initial_percent);\n\n        // fix for firefox. It rounds up and loose 1 pixel\n        start_value += 0.5;\n\n\n        // if there already exists a 'move_y' property, it is removed\n        item.remove_item_property('move_y');\n\n        item.add_item_property('move_y', initial_percent, 100, start_value, end_value, '');\n\n\n        var scale_factor = parseFloat(1 + Math.abs(scale_seed) / item.full_height).toFixed(2);\n\n\n        // if there's already registered an 'animation_callback' function, it is removed\n        delete item.animation_callback;\n\n        item.animation_callback = function () {\n\n            var property_value = parseFloat(item.computed_item_properties['move_y']).toFixed();\n\n            item.jqueryObj.css({\n                'left': '50%',\n                '-webkit-transform': 'translate3d(-50%,' + property_value + 'px, 0px) scale(' + scale_factor + ',' + scale_factor + ')',\n                'transform': 'translate3d(-50%,' + property_value + 'px, 0px) scale(' + scale_factor + ',' + scale_factor + ')'\n            });\n\n            item.redraw = false;\n        };\n}\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdAjaxLoop = {};\n\n(function () {\n    'use strict';\n\n    tdAjaxLoop = {\n        loopState: {\n            'sidebarPosition': '',\n            'moduleId': 1,\n            'currentPage': 1,\n            'max_num_pages': 0,\n            'atts' : {},\n            'ajax_pagination_infinite_stop' : 0,\n            'server_reply_html_data': ''\n        },\n\n\n        \n        init: function () {\n            jQuery('.td-ajax-loop-infinite').each( function() {\n                // create a new infinite loader item\n                var tdInfiniteLoaderItem = new tdInfiniteLoader.item();\n\n                tdInfiniteLoaderItem.jqueryObj = jQuery(this);\n                tdInfiniteLoaderItem.uid = 'tdAjaxLoop';\n\n\n                \n                tdInfiniteLoaderItem.isVisibleCallback = function () {      // the is_visible callback is called when we have to pull new content up because the element is visible\n\n                    if (\n                        0 !== tdAjaxLoop.loopState.ajax_pagination_infinite_stop &&\n                        tdAjaxLoop.loopState.currentPage >= tdAjaxLoop.loopState.ajax_pagination_infinite_stop &&\n                        tdAjaxLoop.loopState.currentPage + 1 < tdAjaxLoop.loopState.max_num_pages  // do we have a next page?\n                    ) {\n                        // stop the callback and show the load more button\n                        jQuery('.td-load-more-infinite-wrap')\n                            .css('display', 'block')\n                            .css('visibility', 'visible')\n                        ;\n\n                    } else {\n                        // load up the next page\n                        tdAjaxLoop.infiniteNextPage(false);\n                    }\n                };\n                tdInfiniteLoader.addItem(tdInfiniteLoaderItem);\n            });\n\n\n            // click on load more - the button should not be visible only when the  ajax_pagination_infinite_stop limit is reached\n            jQuery('.td-load-more-infinite-wrap').click(function(event) {\n                event.preventDefault();\n\n\n                jQuery('.td-load-more-infinite-wrap').css('visibility', 'hidden');\n\n                tdAjaxLoop.infiniteNextPage(true);\n            });\n        },\n\n\n        infiniteNextPage: function (isLoadMoreButton) {\n\n            // prepare the request object\n            tdAjaxLoop.loopState.currentPage++ ;\n            tdAjaxLoop.loopState.server_reply_html_data = '';\n\n            // check here to avoid making an unnecessary ajax request when using infinite loading without button\n            if ( tdAjaxLoop.loopState.currentPage > tdAjaxLoop.loopState.max_num_pages ) {\n                //console.log('END' + tdAjaxLoop.loopState.currentPage + ' max: ' + tdAjaxLoop.loopState.max_num_pages);\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n\n            jQuery('.td-ss-main-content').append('<div class=\"td-loader-gif td-loader-infinite td-loader-animation-start\"></div>');\n            tdLoadingBox.init(tds_theme_color_site_wide, 45);  //init the loading box\n            setTimeout(function () {\n                jQuery('.td-loader-gif')\n                    .removeClass('td-loader-animation-start')\n                    .addClass('td-loader-animation-mid');\n            }, 50);\n\n\n            var requestData = {\n                action: 'td_ajax_loop',\n                loopState: tdAjaxLoop.loopState\n            };\n\n            //console.log('request:');\n            //console.log(tdAjaxLoop.loopState);\n            jQuery.ajax({\n                type: 'POST',\n                url: td_ajax_url,\n                cache:true,\n                data: requestData,\n                success: function(data, textStatus, XMLHttpRequest) {\n                    tdAjaxLoop._processAjaxRequest(data, isLoadMoreButton);\n                },\n                error: function(MLHttpRequest, textStatus, errorThrown) {\n                    //console.log(errorThrown);\n                }\n            });\n        },\n\n        _processAjaxRequest: function (data, isLoadMoreButton) {\n            // stop the loader\n            jQuery('.td-loader-gif').remove();\n            tdLoadingBox.stop();\n\n            var dataObj = jQuery.parseJSON(data);\n\n\n\n            // empty reply - stop everything\n            if ( '' === dataObj.server_reply_html_data  ) {\n                jQuery('.td-load-more-infinite-wrap').css('visibility', 'hidden');\n                return;\n            }\n\n\n            \n\n            jQuery('.td-ajax-loop-infinite').before(dataObj.server_reply_html_data);\n\n            //console.log('reply:');\n            //console.log(dataObj);\n\n            if ( parseInt( dataObj.currentPage ) >= parseInt(dataObj.max_num_pages) ) {\n                jQuery('.td-load-more-infinite-wrap').css('visibility', 'hidden');\n            } else {\n                if ( true === isLoadMoreButton ) {\n                    jQuery('.td-load-more-infinite-wrap').css('visibility', 'visible');\n                }\n            }\n\n            setTimeout( function () {\n                tdAnimationStack.check_for_new_items('.td-main-content' + ' .td-animation-stack', tdAnimationStack.SORTED_METHOD.sort_left_to_right, true);\n                //tdSmartSidebar.compute();\n            }, 200);\n\n\n            // on load more button, we don't have to compute the infinite loader event\n            if ( true === isLoadMoreButton ) {\n                return;\n            }\n\n            setTimeout( function() {\n                //refresh waypoints for infinit scroll tdInfiniteLoader\n                tdInfiniteLoader.computeTopDistances();\n                tdInfiniteLoader.enable_is_visible_callback('tdAjaxLoop');\n                //tdSmartSidebar.compute();\n            }, 500);\n\n\n            setTimeout( function() {\n                tdInfiniteLoader.computeTopDistances();\n            }, 1000);\n\n            setTimeout( function() {\n                tdInfiniteLoader.computeTopDistances();\n            }, 1500);\n\n        }\n    };\n\n})();\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\nvar tdWeather = {};\n\n( function(){\n    \"use strict\";\n\n    tdWeather = {\n\n        // used to translate the OWM code to icon\n        _icons: {\n            // day\n            '01d' : 'clear-sky-d',\n            '02d' : 'few-clouds-d',\n            '03d' : 'scattered-clouds-d',\n            '04d' : 'broken-clouds-d',\n            '09d' : 'shower-rain-d',   // ploaie hardcore\n            '10d' : 'rain-d',          // ploaie light\n            '11d' : 'thunderstorm-d',\n            '13d' : 'snow-d',\n            '50d' : 'mist-d',\n\n            //night:\n            '01n' : 'clear-sky-n',\n            '02n' : 'few-clouds-n',\n            '03n' : 'scattered-clouds-n',\n            '04n' : 'broken-clouds-n',\n            '09n' : 'shower-rain-n',   // ploaie hardcore\n            '10n' : 'rain-n',          // ploaie light\n            '11n' : 'thunderstorm-n',\n            '13n' : 'snow-n',\n            '50n' : 'mist-n'\n        },\n\n        _currentRequestInProgress: false, // prevent multiple parallel requests\n        _currentItem: '',  // current weather object, it is set on click and after we modify it, it will be displayed\n\n        // latitude and longitude position, used in callback hell\n        _currentLatitude: 0,\n        _currentLongitude: 0,\n        _currentPositionCacheKey: '',\n\n        // all the weather items\n        items: [],  \n\n\n\n        \n        init: function () {\n\n            // weather location button click\n            jQuery('.td-icons-location').click(function() {\n                if (tdWeather._currentRequestInProgress === true) {\n                    return;\n                }\n                tdWeather._currentRequestInProgress = true;\n\n                // get the block id\n                tdWeather._currentItem = tdWeather._getItemByBlockID(jQuery(this).data('block-uid'));\n\n                // get the position + callback\n                var timeoutVal = 10 * 1000 * 1000;\n                if (navigator.geolocation) {\n                    navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(tdWeather._updateLocationCallback, tdWeather._displayLocationApiError, {enableHighAccuracy: true, timeout: timeoutVal, maximumAge: 600000});\n                }\n\n                tdWeather._currentRequestInProgress = false;\n\n            });\n\n            jQuery('.td-weather-now').click(function(){\n                if (tdWeather._currentRequestInProgress === true) {\n                    return;\n                }\n                tdWeather._currentRequestInProgress = true;\n\n                // get the block id\n                tdWeather._currentItem = tdWeather._getItemByBlockID(jQuery(this).data('block-uid'));\n\n                if (tdWeather._currentItem.current_unit === 1) {\n                    tdWeather._currentItem.current_unit = 0;\n                } else {\n                    tdWeather._currentItem.current_unit = 1;\n                }\n                tdWeather._renderCurrentItem();\n            });\n        },\n\n\n        \n        addItem: function (item) {\n            tdWeather.items.push(item);\n        },\n\n        ///\n        // For now it's not needed because td_weater.php does not add js if it detects td-composer\n        // **\n        // * Deletes an item base on blockUid.\n        // * Make sure that you add block_uid to items that you expect to be deleted\n        // * @param blockUid\n        // */\n        //deleteItem: function(blockUid) {\n        //    for (var cnt = 0; cnt < tdWeather.items.length; cnt++) {\n        //        if (tdWeather.items[cnt].block_uid === blockUid) {\n        //            tdWeather.items.splice(cnt, 1); // remove the item from the \"array\"\n        //            return true;\n        //        }\n        //    }\n        //    return false;\n        //},\n\n\n        \n        _updateLocationCallback: function(position) {\n            tdWeather._currentLatitude = position.coords.latitude;\n            tdWeather._currentLongitude = position.coords.longitude;\n            tdWeather._currentPositionCacheKey = position.coords.latitude + '_' + position.coords.longitude; //  update the cache key for current position\n\n            // check the cache first and avoid doing the same ajax request again\n            if (tdLocalCache.exist(tdWeather._currentPositionCacheKey + '_today')) {\n                tdWeather._owmGetTodayDataCallback(tdLocalCache.get(tdWeather._currentPositionCacheKey + '_today'));\n            } else {\n                var weather = 'http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?lat=' + tdWeather._currentLatitude + '&lon=' + tdWeather._currentLongitude + '&units=metric&lang=' + tdWeather._currentItem.api_language + '&appid=' + tdWeather._currentItem.api_key;\n                jQuery.ajax({\n                    dataType: \"jsonp\",\n                    url: weather,\n                    success: tdWeather._owmGetTodayDataCallback,\n                    cache: true\n                });\n            }\n\n            //alert(position.coords.latitude + ' ' + position.coords.longitude);\n\n        },\n\n\n        \n        _owmGetTodayDataCallback: function (data) {\n            // save the data to localCache\n            tdLocalCache.set(tdWeather._currentPositionCacheKey + '_today', data);\n\n\n            // prepare the tdWeather._currentItem object, notice that tdWeather._currentItem is a reference to an object stored in tdWeather.items\n            tdWeather._currentItem.api_location = data.name;\n            tdWeather._currentItem.today_clouds = tdUtil.round(data.clouds.all);\n            tdWeather._currentItem.today_humidity = tdUtil.round(data.main.humidity);\n            tdWeather._currentItem.today_icon = tdWeather._icons[data.weather[0].icon];\n            tdWeather._currentItem.today_icon_text = data.weather[0].description;\n            tdWeather._currentItem.today_max[0] = tdUtil.round(data.main.temp_max, 1);                                  //celsius\n            tdWeather._currentItem.today_max[1] = tdWeather._celsiusToFahrenheit(data.main.temp_max);                   //imperial\n            tdWeather._currentItem.today_min[0] = tdUtil.round(data.main.temp_min, 1);                                  //celsius\n            tdWeather._currentItem.today_min[1] = tdWeather._celsiusToFahrenheit(data.main.temp_min);
